I recently started using the web platform too which is just as good. | I am impressed by the capabilities of this travel planner app. A big upgrade to the other trip planner app I used previously. The trip budget calculator is super useful. | With easy to use features and tools to manage travel expenses, it's a must-have for any traveler. | Travel budget section is so good. | Pleased I found this app. That says it all. | Ensures I stick to my vacation budget which I needed. It literally breaks all your spending into categories which is pretty cool and really helpful. | Really well designed trip planner. | I have never been so organized on my trips! | I rely on this travel planner app for all my trips now. Really good app. Highly recommend tripmapper. | I was skeptical about using a travel organizer, but this app proved me wrong. Highly recommend. | Tripmapper's itinerary app has been a game changer for us. Love the look of the app, that you can collaborate, the file uploads, the vacation budget calculator and the flights tracker. | A good vacation planner. | For anyone who loves planning trips, this travel planner app is great. It is user friendly and helps you manage your travel budget. | Making it easy to create itineraries and manage your travel budget. It would be cool if you could book things in the app too. If it did that it would get 5 stars from me. | Essential trip organizer for travelers who plan their own trips. | They have made this app even better with the new flight functionality. Wonder what they will do next! | If you love to create your own itineraries, TripMapper is the app for you. Have planned 5 trips now and will not be without it now! | Impressive customer service. Tried out their new flight feature which is in beta. Of the 4 flights I added to my itinerary, one could not be found. I contacted them in the app and they responded with a fix surprisingly quickly. | Overall, TripMapper stands out compared to other travel itinerary apps I've used. Best designed travel planner in my view and is easy to navigate. | Great cost tracking calculator! Has made a real difference to keeping my spending in check before and during my adventures. | Recommend this app for trip planning. Worth paying for the subscription. | Very good app. They seem to thought of everything! Attaching booking, finding your flights, adding reminders, a filterable map and expenses tracking. They even have the ability to covert the itinerary into a PDF too. | An app that nails group trip planning! | Good app. I would love them to add directions functionality. | I'm really impressed with the budget calculator. | As someone not very tech-savvy, I found the app really easy to use. | I planned a multi-city Europe trip using TripMapper, and it made organizing and coordinating it so easy. Also loved that I could add all my flights (the flight route map looks really cool). | Kudos to TripMapper. They ask for feedback and actually seem to action it. Impressive app. | I have tried 2 other travel planner apps and this one is my favourite. I love the layout, particularly list view. They have a web app too, so I can access my itinerary on my laptop too. | The overall experience so far is really positive. | The collaboration feature is top-notch. This app is a must-have for anyone planning a trip with friends. | Love the design of this app. So easy to use. | I can't imagine planning my trips without TripMapper now. It has made planning my trips so much easier. Highly recommend. | On Free Version Only for now. 

This app is phenomenal and checks many of my boxes for trip planning. 

I use card walls for work and the organization of this for trip planning just makes sense. Seeing my plans laid out, with budgets and color coded cards for different activity types is a great way to see how things should go. I am itching to get the paid version to be able to utilize maps and view my trips that way and many other features. 

The app is smooth, easy to use, fast, responsive, and well designed. The team is great, upbeat and has been super personable and responsive on social media and feedback surveys. They are putting out updates with asked for features and growing a fantastic app organically. 

Sofia - Uncultured Palate | I got this app because I'm an obsessive list maker and have a trip coming up. I wanted to jot down the places we'd be going, costs, and schedule it out. This app does that and converts the currency real time. I'm so very impressed with and thoroughly enjoy this app. The only fix to suggest would be moveable pins in mapping. A location I wanted mapped was Eiffel Tower, for example. No matter how many ways I typed it in, it would drop the pin on the side street instead of on the monument. Side streets can be actual destinations so I don't want confusion. Had to instead use "les boutiques officielles de la tour Eiffel" to get close. But the app even separates the expenses into categories! Five stars for being user-friendly, intuitive, and offering the printable list. | Where’s the iPad version? I’ve downloaded and it works with the iPad but it’s the screen size of an iphone. For that I will give it a 3 star. | I started experiencing a bug with the app which I wrote a review about that I have since deleted, as the support team were super quick to reply to my comment and also fix the issue. It’s always great to have a responsive support experience. 

The app has since been running smoothly, and is such a great simple tool for planning trips to every detail. If you’re an over-planner like me, this app is great. | This app is awesome, but the US time function doesn’t work.  All times are shown as AM no matter what. At first, I thought “oh maybe it’s military time”, but the app doesn’t recognize those times either.  So, my itinerary has Handgliding @4am…

title: GetYourGuide: Travel & Tickets
description:
Download the GetYourGuide app to discover and book unforgettable travel experiences anywhere in the world

Whether you're planning a vacation or looking for last-minute things to do in any destination, we make booking tours, day trips, and activities easier than ever. Choose from culture, food, adventure, nature, and more experiences.

Maximize your trip with exclusive access to the world's top attractions and museums, find the highlights and hidden gems, and keep up with last-minute travel deals using the app — we make travel planning easy, and making memories easier.

Find over 75,000 experiences

Booking tickets for unmissable sights has never been easier — experience the Colosseum, Eiffel Tower, London Eye, TV Tower, Sagrada Familia, and more.

Discover expert-guided tours — explore unforgettable travel highlights in Paris, Dubai, London, Florence, New York City, Berlin, Vienna, New Orleans, Cancun, Tuscany, Lisbon, and more. Our app will be your city guide for destinations around the world, and our local experts help you get fully immersed.

Travel with flexibility

Reserve now, pay later — save your place for popular experiences early and make your payment at a later date.
Instant confirmation — whether you're booking tours in advance or need last-minute tickets, receive your tickets and booking confirmation instantly.
Offline tickets — Conveniently access your booking information offline. Download, store, and present your tickets on your mobile device

Book with confidence

24/7 customer service — Easily find help when you have questions. We offer customer service by email, phone, and in the app across multiple languages.
Flexible cancellation — Don’t stress if your plans change. We offer free cancellation up to 24 hours before your activity for most bookings.

With tours and activities for any interest, you can plan your trips your way. Dive into nature and explore fjords in Norway, try local cuisine across Europe, or uncover fascinating history in the United States.

Whether you're living the magic of the wizarding world on a Harry Potter experience, savoring delicious culinary delights on a food tour of Barcelona, booking top rated tours to see the Vatican, or following a city guide through Berlin, we guarantee you'll find something unforgettable to do — make the most of your travel and leisure time.

Uncover the top tourist activities in the world's bucket-list destinations:
Book museum tours and tickets in Rome, food trips through Naples, trekking in Iceland, river cruises around Prague, outdoor adventures in Bali, sightseeing in Budapest, and more.

Use the app as a travel planner or for travel guidance, then book travel experiences for the world's must-see highlights with excursions and last-minute tickets.

Tell us how we’re doing
Leave us a review if you’re enjoying your GetYourGuide app experience or head over to our help page for further assistance: www.getyourguide.com/contact
releaseNotes:
We update our app every few weeks to ensure that searching for activities feels like being upgraded to first class. Here's a quick overview of what the app team has been up to:

Bugs? Bashed
Crashes? Banished
Design? Beautified

Has our hard work paid off? Tell us what you think by leaving a review.

Something not quite right with the app? Head over to our help page for further assistance: getyourguide.com/contact

)0( %€ •…! | 1 star | This Chinese company took 10x the money for me to go to the Ghibli Museum in Tokyo. They pretended to be American and were full of guarantees. They promised everything would be great but in their own system I bought two tickets and they’re “provider” sent only one. So you know what happened? We traveled all the way to Japan for that one thing schedule-wise and they ruined the whole thing. But they denied the issue until they checked their own Japanese voucher. But customer service never even trusted me I got this from the Lawson in Japan. Use at your own risk it should be banned in the US. My daughter and I missed what was her most important experience to have in Japan. | My partner and I booked a boat tour for 4.24 at 3pm. The operator changed time to 11am which we moved other plans around to accommodate. The instructions on where to meet were poor and confusing. We ended up at another dock #2 as there are two labeled that way at the marina. We spent additional money to get a water taxi to make it to the other side of the marina in time to catch our tour. We communicated while we were trying to get there and they ignored us. When arrived hey had left and refused to speak to us at all. I reached out to the get your guide support chat for help and or a refund and didn’t even get a response after being told to hold on for a few minutes by two different reps. They never came back to the chat and sent emails saying the operator informed them of our cancellation request which we never requested. No one from the app has responded or helped in any way, clearly so a refund doesn’t have to be given. We will never do business again and we will make our experience known publicly and will work with our bank to recoup what was paid. This is clearly a scam. | Use it!! | I booked an experience through this app and I unfortunately wasn’t able to do this experience because the check in process was so long and I was pushing my reservation back and I had already drove an hour and 30 minutes to this experience and I wasn’t able to start an hour later because I had other reservations that day. I tried to get a refund from the host of the experience but they told me to contact “GET YOUR GUIDE” for a refund. I contacted them immediately and told them what happened and they didn’t care they all just wanted to keep the $222 I had spent on something I didn’t even get to do. I wouldn’t have drove and hour and 30 min just to say I wanted a refund. I actually wanted to do it but I wasn’t able to. Get your guide and the experience host just wanted to keep the money. They didn’t care at all. I’m extremely disappointed by this since I use get your guide for all my travel. Beware they don’t care about you just want your money. | The app is fine, but you can’t trust what they say they will provide and stand behind that. Case in point, I booked a day trip from Amsterdam to Brussels. Flew from Boston to Amsterdam for 1 week The trip to Brussels was going to be the highlight of my week.
I made these plans months in advance. The evening before the day for trip I got an email stating the trip was cancelled, just stating not enough participants. I feel like, I gave them months of notice they gave me 1/2 day.
Don’t trust them with your money and the promise of a good time, they won’t keep it | I recently had a dreadful experience with the GetYourGuide app that left me utterly frustrated and disappointed. Despite booking a popular large group tour in Rome several weeks in advance, I inadvertently booked the same tour again for the same day the day before the tour was set to begin. Shockingly, the app failed to notify me of this duplicate booking. Upon realizing my mistake, I immediately attempted to cancel one of the bookings, only to find out that I couldn’t because the tour was less than 24 hours away.

Customer service was an absolute nightmare. Despite numerous emails and interactions with different agents, they all robotically regurgitated the same excuse: “rules are rules.” It’s clear their primary concern is protecting their own interests, even at the expense of customer satisfaction. They shamelessly lied to me about the possibility of a refund, claiming the tour provider wouldn’t cooperate, only to be exposed when I reached out to the actual agency and received a prompt and courteous refund directly from them.

It’s evident that GetYourGuide’s customer service is severely lacking, with a dismissive attitude that suggests they believe their dominance in the market exempts them from providing quality assistance. Save yourself the headache and use alternative platforms like Booking, Airbnb, TripAdvisor, Klook, or any other service that actually values its customers. Trust me, it’s not worth the hassle. | This app turned out to be the best part of planning a 3 day sightseeing trip in Berlin. I was tagging on a few adventures after a work trip, and the suggestions of what to do were super helpful, booking was easy, the app worked great - just scanned QR codes for all of our tickets, nice reminders, and the maps for meeting points made it so easy to figure out where we were supposed to go. Other traveler reviews were also really helpful. Top notch, totally recommend to make your trip easy and meaningful. | Very frustrating to be solicited to sign up and be told a promo code would be sent and it isn’t sent by email. Had to download the app just to chat with someone. Not cool. They don’t offer military discount which is bogus. Get Your Guide was a great app to use in planning some of the places we wanted to see. Purchasing tickets for tours or points of interest was easy and the cancellation policy is very good. We had one place we had to cancel because of time constraints and we got a full refund because we cancelled within the time frame they mentioned. I also like the fact that tickets are stored in the app or you can download it to your phone and since we have iPhones, all our tickets were stored in Apple wallet so it was safe and secure and hassle free as we didn’t have to print physical copies. title: Visited: Travel Map With Lists
description:
Beat your own travel stats. Get inspired to visit exotic new destinations. Track your experiences around the world as you tick off your bucket list.

MAP YOUR TRAVELS
-Design your personal travel map by displaying countries, states / provinces / regions and cities of where you have been or want to visit.

GET INSPIRED
-Visualize your future travels by swiping through beautiful photos and adding them to your wishlist.

TRAVEL ITINERARY

- Wondering where to travel next? We got you covered. Select different destinations and places based on travel lists, experiences and inspirational photos. We'll show you which countries have the highest numbers of places you wish to visit. So you can go down the list and optimize your travel plans. 
- Picking your next travel destination just got a lot easier with the Visited App!

TRAVEL BUCKET LIST
-Keep up with your travel life goals by selecting all the countries of the world that you want to visit.
-Add travel journal notes by country of your travel dates, points of interest or personal memories.

KEEP TRACK OF YOUR TRAVEL JOURNEY
-Share your personalized stats with others! You can share your travel ranking, percentage of the world seen and countries you’ve visited.
-See your top 5 most frequently visited countries.
-Create regional maps for over 20 countries, including United States, Canada, Australia, Germany, UK, Russia, France and others.

TRAVEL EXPERIENCES
-Want to see how many of the worlds’ capital cities you have been to? Or how about how many art museums you’ve visited? Using the list feature, check off places you have been to or want to visit by category. Lists include: African Safaris, Capitals of the World, Wonders of the World, Pyramids, Culinary Experiences, Ancient Sites, Churches, Greek & Roman Ruins, Cruise Ports, Beer Destinations, Palaces, US national parks, Ski Slops, World's Top Beaches, Shopping Destinations, LGBTQ+ Destinations, Popular Hiking Trails, Lakes, Bridges, Snorkelling/Diving Locations, Chocolate Destinations, Castles, Wine Regions, Kids Attractions, Temples, Mountain Ranges, Rock Climbing Locations, Monasteries, Opera Houses, Funicular Railways, Waterfalls, Volcanos, Mosques, US National Monuments, Hot Springs, Tunnels, US Memorial, Dance Shows, Deserts, Famous Prisons, Canal Cruises, Formula One Circuits, Top Surf Spots, Underground Cities, Whale Watching Spots, Synagogues, Caves, US National Historic Site, Tennis Destinations, Film Festivals, US National Battlefields and Scotch Distillery Regions. 
 
-Track your experiences by country such as where you’ve gone golfing, snorkelling/diving, skiing, wine tours and others.

FULLY CUSTOMIZABLE
-Select different colors or design your own based on your travel type
-Pick fully accessible, high contrast colors for your map.
-Dark mode is supported to make the app easier to use while taking a red eye flight
-Adjust the sovereignty for disputed territories

SEE HOW YOU COMPARE TO OTHER TRAVELERS:
- Compare your travel stats with other global travellers or friends
- See the top 10 most popular countries to visit from your home city
- Share your travel map, stats and bucket list with your family and friends

Have you ever had a problem where you can’t actually remember all the countries you’ve been to? That’s why we created Visited – a simple and fun travel tracker. With Visited, you will be able to not only keep a log of all the countries, regions, and cities you’ve been to, but you’ll also be able to see your accomplishments beautifully rendered on a world map that you can share proudly. A digital scratch map if you will! You can also use Visited to plan your upcoming adventures by being inspired by breathtaking travel photos and building up your bucket list.
releaseNotes:
- Adding Video
- Adding New Lists
reviews:

I’m a computer software trainer, usually pretty good with these things, but this app constantly has me befuddled. I eventually figured it out, but then when I need to go back two months later, I’m again confused. | I think Puerto Rico is underwater. | We love to travel.  Middle class Texans, been to a lot nations, all 50 states and most of Texas’ farm to market and back paved/unpaved roads. Aruba, Bonaire and Curacao on our wish list then at 87 we’ll take a break. | The map is poor quality and hard to navigate but it gets the job. Zooming close enough to clearly see borders is frustrating on very small island countries. | If I purchase Visited Pro version, is it gonna be a monthly or yearly subscription? Travel apps are fun, and there are many many others that don’t do this. Choose a different one. | Can you please make the country flag size bigger. | I have never wrote a review EVER… but this may be the WORST app I have ever gotten in my life. Very frustrating to work. Also, something I can get over if the city updates work, is it has plenty of Territories as separate counties which love, but it picks and chooses which ones (such as Canadian territories not being separated from the country) and it also doesn’t acknowledge all disputed territory very well. You can type and choose the cities that you’ve been to and cities that you want to visit. But that is it. You can’t even see a list of those cities that you want to visit, let alone a map of it. Looks like they made it easy for them to collect our information. Inspiration doesn’t have anything. It said it would show travel photos. The only photo it shows is the thumbnail when you select from want/been. If you do download this app, please do go to privacy section and read the “What personal information do we collect?” Section. So far, what a waste of money it has been. title: Rome2Rio: Trip Planner
description:
What is Rome2Rio? 

Rome2Rio is the ultimate tool to make travel planning easy. 

We’ll show you the quickest, cheapest and most convenient transport options to get you where you need to go, anywhere in the world. 

From flights and trains to buses, ferries and rideshares and more; see in an instant all the combinations so you can compare and choose the best travel option for you.

How to use the Rome2Rio app

Enter any address, landmark or city as your destination 

We will show you: 
> All your travel options including by air, by land and by water

> All that you need to know to plan and compare:
* Prices
* Durations 
* Schedules and connections
* Company information
* Booking details

Planes I trains | subways | buses | coaches | rideshares | taxis | self-driving | shuttle buses | private transfers | ferries | watertaxis…  in whichever combo wherever, however you want to go! 

Why use Rome2Rio?

You can rely on our extensive global coverage – it comes from 5,000-plus companies in more than 160 countries.

Whether you’re planning a short weekend getaway or an extended adventure abroad, it's easy to research, compare, and book the most efficient or affordable routes saving you time money, and hassle.


Each month 50M+ global users trust us to plan their trips. With travel information from over 12,000 transport operators covering 10M locations, we are one of the top online travel resources used globally.

Travel planning made easy. 

Contact
www.rome2rio.com
Got feedback?  We’d love to hear it. 
Contact us on feedback@rome2rio.com

title: KAYAK: Flights, Hotels & Cars
description:
KAYAK searches hundreds of travel sites at once to find exactly what you need for your trip, from cheap flights to great hotel deals and car rentals. Nonstop flight leaving at 9am? Sure. Pet-friendly vacation rental near the slopes? Yup. SUV rental for under $50/day? We're on it. Because we're travelers too and know that every trip is worth planning.

BOOK FLEXIBLY
Easily search, filter and sort your options to find the right travel offers for you - whether it's flights you can change with no fees, hotels, vacation rentals and car rentals with free cancellation, the cheapest deal, or the most comfortable seat.

SAVE MONEY
Get mobile-only rates and Private Deals on the app. Set Price Alerts to find out when prices drop, and use Explore to discover new destinations within your budget.

EVERYTHING IN ONE PLACE
This is more than just a travel app. Our Trips tool keeps your plans in order. Get alerts for flight and gate changes, access boarding pass on and offline and plan out and share your itinerary, all from one place. Use Guides to create, collect and share daily itineraries, tips and impressions along the way.

COMPARE FLIGHT DEALS FROM 900+ SITES
• Take the stress out of trip planning. Find flexible flight offers with no change fees.
• Search with flexible dates up to +/- 3 days to see when's the best time to fly.
• Filter options based on stops, airlines, departure times, cancellation policies, amenities & more.
• Save your preferences to see your favorite airlines and hotels first (and skip ones you don't like).
• Book at the right time. Price Forecast lets you know whether you should wait or book now.
• We'll even show you Hacker Fares which pair together two one-way tickets for a round-trip flight (and save you $$).

FIND A RENTAL CAR THAT FITS YOUR TRIP
• Search from over 70,000 locations to find the perfect car rental for your trip.
• Filter your rental car search by vehicle type including hybrids and electric vehicles, offers with unlimited mileage, enhanced cleaning and much more.
• Risk-free booking: Find car rentals with a free cancellation policy so if plans change, you can easily rebook.

HOTELS, VACATION RENTALS AND UNIQUE STAYS FROM THOUSANDS OF SITES
• Compare all sorts of accommodation, from five-star resorts to holiday homes and boutique hotels.
• Looking for a staycation? Uncover deals on amazing places to visit right here in the USA.
• Stay flexible by easily filtering for hotel deals and vacation rentals with free cancellation.
• Unlock Private Deals and exclusive mobile-only rates for even more savings.

EXPLORE: Discover new destinations on your budget
• Whether you have $300 or $3,000 to spend, Explore lets you set a budget and shows you where in the world you can go.

TRIPS: All your travel plans in one place.
• Keep all your plans organized in one travel app, regardless of where you booked.
• Forward your booking confirmation emails to trips@kayak.com or sync your Gmail or Outlook account.
• Use our Flight Tracker to stay up-to-date on any flight's progress, with real-time status updates, gate change & baggage claim notifications.
• Check your Trip Stats to see how far you traveled, your top cities, and how many times you've been around the world.
• Your traveler data is safe and secure - meaning you never have to re-enter your booking and credit card info.
• Share your vacation plans with family & friends.
• No signal, no problem. View your itinerary and notes with no internet connection.

MEASURE YOUR BAG
• AR measuring tool lets you know if your carry-on bag complies with the policy of the airline you're flying with.

PRICE ALERTS: Never miss a deal
• Let us do the searching for you. Create a Price Alert and we’ll notify you when the price drops.

Download the KAYAK travel app now and get ready for your next travel adventure!
releaseNotes: We fixed some bugs here and there to make our app even better.

title: CheckMyTrip – Travel Itinerary
description:
CheckMyTrip is your digital travel assistant, bringing you flight information and alerts, travel services and extras to get you smoothly from door to door. And it’s free.  

Ideal for both business and leisure travelers, CheckMyTrip will help you travel smooth, reduce stress and stay on top of your travel plans.

SMART TRIP ITINERARIES
- Real-time updates of your flight bookings for FREE, including delays, cancellations and terminal changes plus layover times  
- View your trip in a master itinerary with all your bookings, including flight and accommodation, both online and off  

ADDING TRIPS IS EASY  
3 simple ways to add and organize your itinerary details.  
- Forward booking confirmation e-mails to trips@checkmytrip.com  
- Ask your assistant to import the trip automatically by using your booking reference number  
- Send the trip details to your assistant to create the trip for you  

DIGITAL ASSISTANT  
Your personal travel assistant to help you at every step of your trip.  
- Flight delay, cancellation, boarding gate notifications  
- Check-in reminders 
- 5-day weather forecast  
- Search and reserve airport transfer and lounge  
- Recommendations for local activities  

**IMPORTANT REMINDER**  
CHECKMYTRIP IS NOT A TRAVEL BOOKING AGENCY  
We only display information related to the trip details you add to your CheckMyTrip account. To modify, cancel or source additional information about your air, hotel, car, rail, taxi, parking, tour and activity booking, contact the provider directly for assistance.

We respect your privacy. Check our privacy policy. https://checkmytrip.com/privacy-policy  

By downloading the app, you accept the Terms & Conditions of use. https://checkmytrip.com/terms-and-conditions/  

If you have any questions, please contact us by e-mail at feedback@checkmytrip.com
releaseNotes:
In this release, we've added two exciting features to enhance your travel experience:
- Easily sync your travel plans with any calendar app, keeping essential details at your fingertips for a smooth journey.
- Your feedback matters! Share your thoughts by rating CheckMyTrip directly through the app, guiding us to continually improve and tailor the experience to your needs.

Can’t check on any detail about your flight, only simple things like flight numbers and time. THAT’S IT!!! You can’t even see your seat and frequent flyer info. And if you have other people on the same booking? Just forget about it, you can’t check on anything whatsoever. What a f up update. Pointless indeed. | This app is just a scam to withhold your flight confirmation number. I’ve learned my lesson. | It used to sync trip details with the calendar, not anymore | Used to be the best traveling app… not it’s just an overly complicated chatbot under a wanna-be AI disguise that simply does not work. | I used to love this app and would use it to morganite every single trip and introduced it to several friends. Then they upgraded and it became completely useless. I wonder if the developers don’t see that usage has dropped. It would be better for them to revert to the former version honestly. This new version is just awful.  I have moved on to other travel apps. | It is clearly on the airlines flight schedule for that day. I sent in request for fixing it and they said working on it. Still nothing done or working. I deleted it as we are leaving in three weeks. | This app was a very good travel app but it has lost it’s way. Recently had to load booking code (6alpha numeric) to get flight information. This was OK. BUT when it provided “check in” tap the app asked for the booking code. Why? No memory. App knows airlines but if you have already check-in the app can’t cross check with airlines.  I find it’s best to use the airline app and merely use this app (if at all) as a quick reference tool | I tried adding my trip manually several times and it kept giving me wrong flight info, and there is no way to update just one flight of a multi-flight itinerary, which is very frustrating.

I then emailed my itinerary as the other option suggested. When it came back it was still incorrect. 

Not worth my effort, deleted won’t try again. | Over the course of five days, I tried to add a trip using all three of the methods suggested.  I tried to manually add my trip at least 10 times all to no avail.  While this app used to be quite seamless, it now doesn’t seem to work and there doesn’t seem to be anyone you can talk to.  The “assistant” doesn’t connect you to a live person.  I’m ready to dump this app. | Something changed with this app and it’s totally nonfunctional, frozen screen, lost decades of travel data and absolutely zero customer service. | I used this app before, but suddenly it stopped working. Try to add trip and it send you to digital assistant and it goes nowhere | This was a good app a few years ago and extremely useful for a frequent traveler.  It would quickly identify your flights based on your ticket code and provide accurate, timely updates if flights were delayed etc.  Not now - since an “upgrade” (which apparently brought in “artificial intelligence”…) it rarely finds my flights from the reservation code and most times now you have to enter data manually, even when traveling on major airlines. The update facility has either disappeared or just doesn’t work anymore - I am sat in a plane which was announced to be delayed 6 hours ago and CheckMyTrip still hasn’t picked up on it.  It is now a complete waste of time.  I used to use this app all the time and rely on it for frequent travel.  Sadly it is going downhill rapidly… | I heard about this app on a trusted travel forum.  I really just doesn’t work.  Can find my flights using confirmation code, cant find my reservation using flight/date combination.

Not worth the time I spent.  Deleted the app on Day 1 | Used to be a useful website and app, now totally useless. Fails to import bookings and relies on a stupid chat agent for doing anything. Just chasing the AI bandwagon by adding a dumb chat bot for basic functionality. Deleting my account and the app. | I’ve been trying for 20 minutes to login for the first time. It keeps sending a code to my email and when I paste and add it into the app, it says it is an invalid code. Does anybody know if a better app to keep track of my travel itinerary? | We used to enter the booking reference but now it asks to enter each flight number and date … bit of a pain on a long trip with many flights and days | Doesn’t add trips either via forwarded email or manually.  No support.  Message app reply to request says basically that they are busy with other requests.  It’s worth the cost-i.e. nothing.  I use TripIt for all my travel —great app and well worth paying for. | It takes forever trying to search your trip if its on a different email. They have ruined the app. Nobody wants to sit and chat with a bot and enter all flight details manually. Not a great idea. Should go back to the way it was. | So extra for no reason, AI used in app is trash I hope to god I never have to use it again | If you can’t access your email that you originally set up the account with you can never sign back in because the app will only send a code to the defunct email account. Its as dunb as it sounds. | It needs a way to correct a flight without deleting the entire trip. Flight from ORD-YVR comes up as Omaha to Chicago | This stupid AI app ever. Doesn’t work whata junk | Used to be comprehensive and good. Now, pathetic | Do not waste your time with this app | It working very well, why u change and remove everything, what is the point now from your current up?!!! | The new version is awful, fully stripped down of features and providing as little information as possible. New trips are difficult to add, they disappear after adding, while deleted trips reappear. The assistant is unhelpful. Amadeus is well equipped to provide a good product and this is clearly an act of self destruction. | The app used to be good without the digital assistant. From the reviews that I’ve read, it looks like the developers aren’t looking to fix the app. Welp….time to switch apps. | It was sooo much easier to use without the bot. Even after adding details, can’t see trip. Scrap the bit feature | The latest version of this app it is a huge mistake. 
I’ve used CheckMyTrip for at least 20 years, even when it was just a webpage and not an app and with the new upgrade I cannot use it any longer. 
I used to store all my business and personal trip information using booking reference and my name info but now the only way to automatically import trip information with the booking reference is if you have personally booked the trip with your email address which it is not the normal practice in the business world. 
I hope that future versions will incorporate back the option to import bookings with the traveler info. | The update that requires use of a cumbersome chat bot for any inputs was a bad choice by the app developers.  It involves what should be in unnecessary inputs and is not initially intuitive. Please bring back the option to enter the old way.  Will not use this app, which I liked using before this change, until this requirement is removed and at worst the chat bit is an option. | We’ve used this app in the past and it was awesome. From the last time we’ve used it it has gone off a cliff horrible | This was a great APP prior to the latest update which crashed all of the data and no longer accepts confirmation numbers when you use a travel agent.  Sent in more than 5 requests to their customer support with no response.  I’ve deleted the APP and made note of the developer to avoid any future APPs created by them. | New version is quite useless and not user-friendly. Unable to add trip easily like the old versions. I will probably not use this anymore and have to rely on each airline’s mobile app instead for each trip. | This had been a fine app.  In March, however, they rolled out a purported “update” that simply does not work in any respect.  It’s not only useless, but it’s a negative — you undertake actions to add flights to the app, only to find that there’s nothing there.  I cannot understand why they ever rolled out the “update” or why, upon realizing that it was a complete bust, they didn’t go back to the old, functional app.  Unreal.  DO NOT DOWNLOAD IN ITS CURRENT STATE. | Was working great, a favorite app. Latest update requires a fresh log in and now my trip is lost and the Amadeus booking code is “unknown.” Not happy. | The recent update destroyed the app. I used to really like this app prior to the recent update and probably would’ve rated it as 4 or 5 stars for that version. However, since the most recent update the app is now a shell of its former self. It is clunky and hard to use, and 95% of the information it used to provide is gone. 
Don’t waste your time with this app so long as this is the version is in operation because it is useless in this form. | This app is practically worthless. Trying to add a trip in the app? Don’t bother. You won’t be able to unless you forward your confirmation email to the developer. This app is a horrible waste of time.

Update: I forwarded my trip confirmation email, received a reply email stating it was added, and it still doesn’t populate in the app. This app isn’t “practically” worthless… it’s COMPLETELY worthless. | Last update makes you go into a chat with a virtual admin assistance and you cannot see your trips anymore. Big mistake, everyone I know is going to another app. | Latest update seems to have broke the app. I keep getting dummy notifications and emails for random trips that are not mine. | Won’t load my SW flights. Won’t load my cruise. Manually added my AA flights then it says error so that was a waste of time!!! Deleting this is app! I’ll stick with individual apps to keep track of flights/cruise.

title: Pilot: Group Trip Planner
description:
NOW IN EARLY PUBLIC BETA - MANY MORE FEATURES COMING SOON!

Pilot is a free travel app for friends to discover activities and plan & share trips with each other, all in one place. Collaborate on things to do with your travel groups, create itineraries with map views for any type of trip and see all of your travel plans on the go.

Make and plan itineraries.

Easily build your travel itinerary using Pilot, from weekend getaways and vacation planning to backpacking adventures and road trips with partners, family and loved ones. Great for all travel occasions, from grad trips and concerts to work travel and bachelor parties! Put in all of your destinations and activities in one place and easily access or reorder them on your trip.

See your travel plans on a map.

While you build your travel plans on Pilot, view all of your activities and destinations on a map, showing where everything is from each other. Easily add itinerary items from the map and discover details about attractions.

Access your travel docs and notes in one place.

Store all your travel documents, files in one spot with Pilot. Upload flight details, hotel bookings, events & tour reservations and other tickets to keep everything organized and accessible. Maintain a centralized travel hub to share with your travel buddies for stress-free trip-planning.

Stay organized and add activities on the go.

Need to bring your travel plans with you? Automatically syncs to Pilot’s web app so you can bring your travel details with you on the go.to the companion mobile app to plan with the comfort of your laptop and bring trip details on the go. Update your plans as you travel with Pilot, add new places to visit or change your itinerary and keep everyone updated in real time.

Collaborate and vote with friends

Share and invite friends to plan trips together on Pilot. Suggest activities & share ideas on what to do next to make the trip fun for everyone and get your travel buddies excited for the adventure of a lifetime!
releaseNotes: Bug fixes and feature improvements

title: Tripwise: AI Travel Planner
description:
Tripwise is an AI-powered travel planner and guide that makes it easy to create personalized itineraries for 4853 cities around the world. Whether you're visiting London, Paris, Dubai, New York, Singapore, Hong Kong, or any other city, Tripwise can help you plan your trip with ease.

Using Tripwise is simple - just select your destination city, travel dates, and interests, and the app's AI technology will do the rest. It will group sights by day and generate an optimized route for less walking, so you can make the most of your time and see everything you want to see.

With Tripwise, you'll have access to a wide range of features and benefits. The app provides insider tips from locals, travel guides for popular destinations, and a variety of travel modes to choose from. You can also customize your itinerary as much or as little as you want.

Download Tripwise today and start planning your dream trip. It's the perfect app for travelers who want to explore a new city without the hassle of planning. Whether you're a first-time visitor or a seasoned traveler, Tripwise will make your trip unforgettable.

Terms of Use: https://www.termsfeed.com/live/1019f54d-6294-43b0-a792-3982d282d8ff
Privacy Policy: https://www.termsfeed.com/live/d5b894cf-353b-48c0-ac63-ffb2e0c43b92
releaseNotes: - improvements and other bug fixes
reviews: I was very much looking forward to using this app as it seems to be designed exactly what I wanted- I enter a place/city and dates and it gives me a list of the most important places to visit on each date, grouped and placed on a map. Unfortunately the app simply doesn’t work half of the time. Often itinerary doesn’t complete so you need to close the app and start again. You get annoying pop ups to upgrade to paid version all the time. And now, after I played with the app and added and deleted several (I feel like 3 or 5) itineraries, it doesn’t let me to do anything without paying. I don’t mind paying, but I don’t want to pay for an app that doesn’t work. I have an upcoming trip and will be visiting multiple cities and this app, if worked, would be a great help. | App is covenient for creating city itineraries, as it automatically adds places based on your interests, not all suggested places may be a perfect fit, but it still provides good ideas for exploring the city | Maybe an interesting app, I don’t know yet. Let me explore.

title: Mapview Sales Route Planner
description:
Field sales and service reps use Mapview to visualize their data geographically and to plan the best route for their customer visits.

Mapview enables you to efficiently manage your territory with easy-to-use mapping and planning tools. Improve trip planning by viewing your appointments and drop-in visits as a route, while easily visualizing other contacts along the way.

Once downloaded, enjoy a free 30 day trial. Our individual use Pro Plan includes unlimited contact mapping and your choice of payment frequency: Monthly ($11.99/mo), Quarterly ($29.99/quarter), or Annually ($95.99/year).

Mapview’s contact mapping software helps outside sales and service reps perfect their scheduling, route planning, and sales call process.  

- Seamlessly integrates with Contacts, Calendar & Map apps

- Easily import spreadsheets of data creating automatic groups from custom field columns. 

- Plan daily routes with drop-in visits and calendar appointments. Easily respond to schedule changes on the go.

- Use route optimization to organize trips by time or distance.

- Visualize your territory and travel routes to help locate opportunities along the way. 

- Use different pin styles to prioritize and organize accounts into groups. Target specific customers and prospects by filtering groups on the map.

- Manage sales or service territory by sending emails, taking notes and setting up meetings in Mapview.

- Log activities such as contact notes, phone calls, emails, and events - most logged automatically for you so you can spend more time selling or servicing.

- Utilize Mapview offline by accessing saved info, routes, directions & target map area.

- Individual users can export contact data, groups, and activities to a CSV file for easy reporting.

Features:
- Excel spreadsheet import easily adds contacts or any location-specific data (CSV file)
- Selectively import external contact groups (Exchange, iCloud, etc.) from your device's address book
- Tap and hold on map to create a contact, appointment, or task
- Pick from over 100 unique pins or create your own
- Create custom groups to organize/prioritize data
- Use multi-criteria group filtering to include or exclude data from the map
- Utilize Advanced Search to select records based on a field value
- Set follow up tasks with priority and status
- Schedule appointments
- View multiple calendars and up to 3 months of appointments at a time on the map.
- Appointments sync to external calendars (ex. iCloud, Gmail, Exchange) linked to your device
- Use addresses or lat/long coordinates for mapping
- View ETA, distance, travel time & directions en-route
- Color-coded routes show on-time or late status
- Use radial search to filter contacts by proximity to a location and sort contacts by distance
- Log notes using speech to text capabilities

Manage your territory’s funnel and exceed your quota with this easy to use sales mapping and productivity tool. 

Automatic Renewal Feature: Your payment will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Your subscription automatically renews unless you turn off auto-renew at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period with the cost listed. You can manage your subscription and you may turn your auto-renewal off by logging into your iTunes Account Settings after purchase. No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during the active subscription period. Privacy Policy: www.mapview.com/privacy-policy/
Terms of Use: www.mapview.com/terms-conditions/
releaseNotes:
We're excited to announce a new update to Mapview, designed to make your navigation and contact management even more intuitive and efficient. Here's what's new in this release:

• Customizable Text Under Pins:
- Enhanced Display Options: You now have the power to control what's displayed under the pins on your map. Choose between showing a contact's name or the company name directly under the pin, giving you the flexibility to tailor the map display to your needs.
- Dual Information Visibility: This new feature enables you to see both the contact's name and the company name for a pin, making it easier to navigate through your contacts and manage your day more effectively.

• Performance Improvements:
- We've turbocharged the app's performance, especially when displaying a large number of pins in a compact area. Expect smoother interactions and quicker load times, enhancing your overall Mapview experience.

This update is part of our ongoing commitment to provide you with the most efficient and user-friendly mapping solution available. Whether you're planning your sales route, scheduling deliveries, or simply organizing your contacts, these new features are here to support your success.

Update Mapview today to start taking advantage of these new enhancements. As always, we value your feedback and look forward to bringing you even more improvements in the future. Happy mapping!
reviews:

Also have to mention the name tag feature for viewing your companies list on the map 😍10/10 for anyone in sales 👍🏼 | Can’t even get past the login screen. Piece of crap. | A lot of good things about this app I could say and I’m sure all these other reviews could and do tell you but I sometimes put in a full set of leads and seconds later they delete it’s the most frustrating thing about this app | I’ve used this app for a few years with great success and also good support from the developer.   This past week it’s started crashing once the app was turned on for use.   The developer answered the phone the first time I called me and offered a fix yet that hasn’t fixed the problem and thus this app is not operational.  I’ve been respectfully (phone call only once a day, one text per day, one email per day) reaching out to the developer for the last two plus days and am hearing only crickets.    I hope the developer is okay yet I’m kind of dead in the water with working my book of business and new leads. | I’m going one star because I have been using Mapview for 3 years now and most recently I have been having issues with trips not optimizing, the app closes randomly when doing various activities such as importing spreadsheets, optimizing trips, searching for names, changing filters, etc. These are the basics features that used to make this app the best for work. Unfortunately I have not received any response from customer support regarding my issues and now feel they are intentionally not responding to me. I will update or remove this review if these issues are resolved. Until then do not waste your money investing in the app, you’re better off going with free one. I have re-installed more times than I can count, to no avail.

From one very unhappy user. | Needs more customer service. Frustrating to say the very least. I have emailed customer service repeatedly and have yet to receive a reply. 
5 stars because I have been looking for an app to replace this one and I have been unable to find one that provides the mass importing of my customers and separate grouping as well.  So I continue to use it in spite of the difficulties of using it | Went to use an all my contacts disappeared. Emailed them been 3 days no response. Went in an did a restore to backup - nothing. Before all this would have given them 3.5 to 4 rating but now they seem to think once you pay for the PRO version an they have your money they could care less about you | The crashing of the app has been if going on for a while with no clear resolution or communication. Great app for what I need it to do.. when it works. Been using for almost 2 years. However, the efficiency of its functionality is steadily declining. | Emailed support but no answer yet - thanks! | 1) This app used to show driving directions between two locations by simply clicking on two points. That functionality no longer exist. 

2) I can’t find a way to sync between two devices. The developer claims you can set up an iCloud account, but this doesn’t work.

The only reason I knew was a notification from Apple. This is simply not right and I’ll bet I’m not the only one this has happened to. | This app use to be the best on the market. Did everything I needed as a field sales rep. Now it closes unexpectedly when I am in the middle of entering data into a lead. Some times it takes me 3-4 tries to finish a task. This issue is completely unacceptable and needs to be fixed. | I do love everything about this app.  It is a very useful sales tool, but until the crashing issues get worked out I can’t give it the 5 stars it deserves. | I have been stuck a few times during my initial client upload, and when I wanted to add new clients. Casey always responds quickly, professionally and with great courtesy and his directions are so easy to follow and ALWAYS fixes my issues.
What a great company and the App is absolutely a game changer for any “road warrior “ who knows that time = money!
Thank you Casey and thank you Mapview | App will not stop crashing. Be sure if the user service and efficiency it creates we have over 200 fold agents using the program. It’s required when they onboard. I get it, bugs happen and need worked out. Why has the communication stopped? 

This is now having a major impact on our business. | App keeps crashing!! | Still waiting for it to work with new IOS | Pls update us as to when 14.1 will be available | Spoke to CALVIN ON HOW TO IMPORT INTO MAPVIEW FROM A SPREADSHEET AND HE WAS GREAT! DEF MAKES LIFE EASIER! | Mapview has been great to use and helps with efficiency for Route Planning, CRM note taking, and being able to export the list after a weekly sales trip. Also, whenever we need tech support for question, they are promptly to reply either email or discuss over phone. Thank-you Mapview | Just what I needed for a 30 year old mobile business which doubled over past 2 years. This app helps me focus. I have a very large data base that even Apple warned me was too big and Mapview can handle it. I keep finding more features and I’ve barely scratched the surface. Email questions to friendly tech support are answered clearly, within hours. Thank you Mapview. I’ve come a long way from Thomas Guides LOL | I have used this app at the highest priced plan for several years now. Every five minutes it crashes and deletes all of my imported contacts. Nobody is available online to live chat and my emails get rejected and sent back to me. Unfortunately I am finding a new provider for this... | This application is a game changer for insurance agents regardless if you’re a telesales agent or a face to face agent. You’re able to import excel sheets by converting to cvs files and loading all the data in in a matter of minutes rather than manually entering client information in. Once loaded you have a “map” birds eye view of all your clients in the location they live. You can set filters to each client based on the criteria you want. You also can log client conversations or any additional material inside each clients individual file. Helps tremendously for follow up calls to have quick access at notes. 

There’s also a route optimization feature to plan your route for the day, and it will show you the optimum route based on your preference. 

Quick features such as one click to dial from inside the clients file allows you to call blitz an area to schedule close proximity appointments, and a one click to pull up the map and route to someone’s house. 

When it comes to organizing your book of business and an app that helps you with one management look to Mapview. It has helped me keep track of all the accounts in my territory and has been a great tool to increase my business. | Used this App daily for call planning and routing. My customers were K-12 schools in Florida.  Rather than spending a half of a day figuring out which schools to target in a given area and the best order for calls (to minimize backtracking), I just opened Mapview, picked a geographic area to target (my customer locations were easy to see on the map) and hit the road.
