You don’t gotta worry about where to stay or what to do, it’s already on there! | Muy informativo puedo guardar todos los lugares que quiero visitar además ya tengo una idea de cómo se ven | I have a trip to dubai and use some free app for offline map , but this app is best of others. Thanks | One of the most reliable maps offline in Dubai . It helps when you don't have local SIM card. Would like to have a similar one around the world. | As a free app it has much to offer, it's one of the best free apps i've ever seen | This app was extremely helpful in an offline map capacity. I liked how it was not only reliable but very searchable. Thanks for making my trip a breeze. | I was in Dubai last week and I found every place, pig stores and route back to Hotel with this wonderful app. | برنامج جميل 👌👍 | Made my first trip to Dubai feel like I was there once before. Recommend to anyone going there. | Do this app have route search ??

title: Lyft
description:
Get where you’re going with Lyft.

Whether you’re catching a flight, going out for the night, commuting to the office, or running errands in a rush, the Lyft app offers you multiple ways to get there.

EASY TO USE
Enter your destination. See your route and ride cost up front. Choose Priority Pickup to get going quick. Boom. Done. Simple

CHOOSE YOUR WHEELS
Choose from Wait & Save, Priority Pickup, Bikes & Scooters, Lyft XL, Lyft Lux, Transit, or even Rentals.

AFFORDABLE RIDES
Our Wait & Save option helps you get around for less. And you can find the fastest public transit routes, too.

* Lyft ride types may vary by region. Check the app to see what is available in your city.
—
Prices vary based on market condition.

By downloading the app, you agree to allow Lyft to collect your device's language settings.
releaseNotes: Thanks for using Lyft! We update our app regularly to make your rides even better. Every update of our Lyft app includes improvements in speed and reliability, as well as bug fixes and performance improvements. As new features are released, we’ll highlight those for you in the app.
reviews:
Thank god for our driver taking responsibility and taking her job seriously. She drove 15 minutes out of the way- which shouldn’t have been out of the way but Lyft misread the directions. She could have dropped us off in a random field 15 min from our house but she did the right thing and brought us to the right place, even though Lyft wasn’t compensating for that. Absolutely ridiculous and if I was alone as a female would have been terrified. But Chrystal was amazing and deserves far more than what she’s getting from you. | Sometimes the app found a close drive but it’s change for another driver so far. This services every day is worst and so expensive | Great conversationalist, clean car, great driver, all around a five star experience…thanks Launa!

Bikram
Aka Bik | I would rate 0 stars if possible. My ride was canceled several times and no one came. Took a taxi instead, this service is absolutely useless unless you pay extra for an upgraded version. Will never use again. | I specifically picked the wait and save because it said 10-25 min pick up time. I was having a drink w a friend and my ride was there 2 mins after I ordered it. Mohammad was great. Don’t do a wait and save though if the time frame doesn’t match up. | Taroy is awesome!  He allowed us to stop at WaWa to pick up some groceries on our way in.  Greatly appreciated! | Cheryl picked us up after our dinner cruise. We are three ladies, including me, in Charleston for the first time on vacation. The car was spotless, Cheryl was friendly, and we had a very nice conversation from the dock to our hotel.  Also, Cheryl’s GPS was sending her the wrong, maybe the long way. She realized this right away, and knew exactly where she was going to bring us directly back to our hotel. We have been here for 4 days and have walked everywhere so we also knew that Cheryl took the shortest route. Great job. | Very nice guy!!! | THE most personable, thoughtful, and competent ride I have had with Lyft. I thoroughly enjoyed the 30 minute ride, surrounded by idiotic Florida drivers to whom Curtis bore no commonality save holding a steering wheel. | beautiful | Great driver and a great person! | Pay more to wait longer? Pay three times more to schedule?! Lyft is a dishonest company! Dropping them and deleted the account. They should go out of business. | GREAT CONVERSATION & VIBE | Professional curiosity respectful safe travel
RM | Driver never came. Still got charged. Lyft “customer service” will gaslight you and say you got a ride because we charged your card. Yeah, it doesn’t make sense. | Grateful for Lyft | Nice clean car | 98% of the time their arrival time is a flat out lie. It’s always double. I never have the problem with Uber. | I’m up and surprised at my total for a ride is more than what I sign up for. That’s the only reason for the lower rating. Aside from that they do a great job and the drivers are excellent. | The lift system kind of jerked me around a little bit. One driver seem to be going around in circles and rerouting and eventually I got the second driver who patiently waited for me while I found him. Good system, but it was a little tense finding the car that had come for me. Still I highly recommend Lyft. | Prices are observed there’s no way I should have to pay $20 for a 3 mile trip | Allen was awesome, new to Lyft, carry himself like he been with ya’ll for years. Give him a bonus. | In short, this is the worst of the scooter service companies. Their “no go” zones are far larger. than other scooter services, and they are much more strict about imposing “incorrect parking” fines. I’ll never be taking a Lyft scooter again. Thanks. | Treats drivers bad they are underpaid and it shows  Uber is almost always cheaper. The thing about this app is that it never knows my location even tho it’s turned on. Im tired of this. Very expensive and not worth it. If I could I wouldn’t use this app. Use Uber | While others were fretting about the transfer to the Airport, I was able to get a Lyft ride with a 10 minute wait at a better price than the sponsored bus and with personal service. Why go anywhere else? | Absolutely love Derek !! I was so anxious and he helped calm me down! AND I LEFT MY PHONE IN HIS CAR! He came back to give it to me! Definitely recommend Derek!! | Clean car, good driver | After much digging, you can find a place on the app to add other people as folks you can book the car for. Unfortunately, the instructions on how to book a car for somebody other than yourself are wrong, and so you can’t do this after all. | The ride was easy to schedule and got there so fast it was amazing | Very nice driver clean car and very family oriented | I would like to have this driver again for May 1 appointment that I have for national Spain Center Pain Center, Nico for 9 o’clock in the morning thank you very much | I deleted the app temporarily. When I reinstalled it, my money was gone. Lyft, why is my balance $0? | Super… quick, nice, clean | I find  it pretty easy to use | Very attentive and accommodating! | Fast, Considerate, and Safe. Thanks, I would recommend without a doubt. | This app stole money from me and refuses to pay it back. You all are crooks who steal from people! | Lyft’s whole policy of “book a ride then call the driver to see if they can take your pet to the Emergency Vet… then wait around messaging driver after driver until you find someone who will respond AND come” would be laughable… if it wasn’t so darn dangerous for all the pets waiting around for a ride to get life saving care.

Just add an option when searching for a ride that asks for pet info (dog/cat, weight/size, carrier/leash, etc etc) first THEN matches you with a driver who is pet friendly. Stop gambling with pets lives. | Great driver | I’m so incredibly disappointed by Lyft. I use ride sharing almost every day and twice today, going to and leaving the airport, they dropped my ride and lied about the time. The first time the driver was all of a sudden driving the wrong direction and I had to cancel it. Almost missed my flight. The second time someone picked it up and it said one minute away, but he was still dropping someone off, then he canceled me. If Lyft can’t make this right I’m going to delete the app and tell everybody in my company not to use them. | The ride couldn’t have been better in spite of heavy traffic. The driver was perfect. The car was clean. He arrived right on time.. | It’s a bait and switch. Should be illegal. Offered pricing but then never got a driver .. waited over 30 minutes then finally booked Uber. If you want an actual ride I would never use Lyft. | This app has been defunct for two weeks that I know of. It will not load the ride  options Apple xr | It is getting worse and more unsafe every single day. 

1-Many many drivers who are different from the person who is actually registered with the company. What is the point of background check? And who is responsible if sth. happens? 
Some don’t even speak English not even a word. They can’t even say“I don’t understand English „ I don’t believe they would get the job if they can’t communicate with ppl who are taking the ride. Sometimes things can happen and we need to communicate. 

-The guidelines are so simple in the company that drivers allow themselves to give rides with a TOTALLY different car that is not even registered and then asking if I was scared to get into the car!!!this is the last ride I am taking with lyft. If the company was strict enough no one would allow him/herself to do that.

-Lying about waiting time.

-I will delete the app today because it is not my job to waste my time after every single ride to let the company know there was a safety issue. It is the company’s job to have strict rules when it comes to other people‘s safety and life. | Great ride! | I meet awesome people on this app | Lyft map routing seems to always find the worst route to get me somewhere on time. My Drivers who use Google maps or Tesla maps instead of the Lyft maps consistently get me to my destination in the time it takes if I drive it myself. If they try to follow Lyft maps, we get stuck in avoidable traffic or poor routing through roads with frequent stoplights instead of highways and interstates. For goodness sake, just use Google map data or Waze or something. | Jane is very kind.  Came as fast as she could in spite of traffic. I felt very safe.  I am very pleased and thankful. | Driver was very patient and helpful.  Best Uber driver. Thanks again. | Drivers always go to the back which is no longer a through street. Based on the estimate of three minutes arrival time I chose not to drive today for a court deadline. I could see the driver was in the wrong spot and called and gave him exact directions that he somehow mess up. Twenty minutes after app originally predicted three minutes I called four times and driver refused to answer.

title: Allstays Camp & RV - Road Maps
description:
Camp & RV is your gateway to adventure. It's time you enjoy the journey with the most popular camping app for adventurers, campers, hikers and more on phone and web!

We help you find and filter places and services with or without internet connection. Tents, RV resorts, parking lots, fuel, rest areas, repairs, tunnels, and even inclines. Get extensive filters and thousands of unique points you’ll only find on Camp & RV. 

Camp & RV has been featured on the App Stores’ Featured Picks for “Travel, “Summer”, “Sun Road Trip” & “Great Outdoors”, Starbucks’ “Featured App”, and rated Excellent by Wired Mag. Our data was also featured in Harvard Business Review. 

Your next outdoor adventure awaits you. Find campgrounds not available anywhere else & plan your next getaway right with Camp & RV. 

CAMP, RVs & BEYOND
• Discover 34,000 campgrounds around the US & Canada with popular, hike-in, boat-in & off road spots.
• Over 500,000 total map pins across North America!
• Outdoor Guide: Find camping spots with showers, and get detailed information about amenities.
• Campgrounds: Find campgrounds in military famcamps, national parks, public or private land & more.
• Extras: Navigate grocery store locations, casinos, stores, rest areas, RV rentals, services & more.

FIND CAMPGROUNDS & OUTDOOR ADVENTURES
• Start out for free and view all camping icons, basic campground information, campgrounds around you

SUBSCRIBE FOR
• One touch to check availability & book at over 4,500 public campgrounds
• Add and view campground reviews
• See right on the map if a place takes RVs or tents, is hike-in or dispersed
• Filter the map by type and by over 30 amenities. Find hundreds of possibilities.
•Get offline maps and discover thousands more places than other sources.

NAVIGATION & FILTER TOOLS FOR YOUR PERFECT GETAWAY
• Filter the map by type and over 30 amenities – discover hundreds of options.
• Want to see only campgrounds or tenting and no extras? One touch does it.
• Find places with overnight parking, restaurants, truck stops, showers, & more. 
• Lookup data by type, state & city without service.
• Map adds points on the fly as you scroll.

INTUITIVE & HELPFUL APP – EVEN WITHOUT SERVICE
• Get Camp & RV for iPhone/iPad.
• No service? No problem, Camp & RV has the information you need, when you need it.
• Check NOAA Weather by GPS right from our app to get the latest forecasts.
• Photo and review searches that use the power of the entire web, not just one source. Add your reviews.
• Find useful extras like truck and rest stops, dump stations, supplies, RV service, bridges & road grades.
• Quick resources for road conditions, emergencies and various state laws.

SEE WHAT OTHERS HAVE SAID ABOUT CAMP & RV:
"Packed with comprehensive information. For those with more discerning tastes in campsites & RV spots”
–  NY Times

"Whether you're looking for RV grounds with full amenities or far-flung campsites for a rough getaway, Camp & RV has you covered."
– MacNewsWorld

"The essential camping app - This is a must have app." 
 – appadvice.com

"Camp & RV app is a must."
 – Womans Day

"Best iPhone App for a Road Trip"
 – Techlicious

"By far the best of the camping apps"
 – Motorhome Forums

SUBSCRIPTION DETAILS

Payment will be charged to your iTunes account. Your subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current subscription period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current subscription period. Automatic renewals will cost the same price you were originally charged for the subscription. You can turn off auto-renewal at any time by going to your Account Settings on the App Store after purchase.

Terms of Service: https://www.allstays.com/Services/termsservice.htm

SUPPORT

** See more at http://www.allstays.com/apps

** US & Canada only. Requires internet to load maps into memory.

Questions/requests? Email: apps@allstays.com for a real reply.
releaseNotes:
Big news! AllStays has leveled up with our latest update. Discover refreshed details for your favorite camping spots, along with some bug fixes and improvements.
Love the app? Don't forget to leave us a review on the App Store. Your feedback keeps us motivated to keep improving. Happy camping!
reviews:
I use this app all the time. Note that it’s not perfect—best to verify info—but it’s pretty darn good at locating campgrounds and providing relevant info, ratings & photos. | AllStays is my GoTo site for all of my trip planning.  I read the reviews and star ratings as well as the pictures of the campground. | When traveling and we want to make an unplanned stop or find a new location this has been the one app we always go to. It is such an easy approach to use and the reviews are always accurate. This has kept us out of some pretty sketchy places. Totally worth the money. | I only use it on the iPhone and iPad. Please, I don’t want to extend it to the web (“Pro”). Please consider nagging me about it a little less frequently on my iOS devices. | This is the best phone app ever created and is the only one I’ve ever paid for! Up-to-date information on RV parks, reviews, address, phone numbers, amenities like LP on site and cabins. It’s great! Sadly, the $9.99 I paid fifteen years ago doesn’t cut it anymore and it’s now a yearly subscription. Well, I gave it some thought and I’m in. Well worth it. | Love this app it has almost everything you need. The only thing that would make it greater is if you could “save your favorite” campgrounds. Getting a little pricey. | We’ve been traveling around the U.S. since retiring in 2016 and this app is my “go to” for finding the places suited to our camp style. It’s the best and hasn’t let us down. Makes trip planning a breeze! Thanks | Easy to use across the USA. | We down loaded this  app in 2015  it’s outstanding  we use it every time we travel it gives you all the information you need for anything you’re looking  for. | I have been using the Allstays app since it first came out. It is my first go to app for. Camping. | Nothing works.  No information on sites given. Things written on site are so small, a magnifying glass is needed. Do not waste your money. | I have used this app for years and love the way it allows you to sort sites by type.  So if I want a State Park, just apply the filter and it will show those to you on the map.  Very convenient and find it to be accurate. | While I like the app, I was supposed to be grandfathered in for the free app and $20 is a little steep. As soon as I figure out how to cancel I will. I may have to delete the card.
I was assured that I would be grandfathered in, but I was charged. I emailed them and never heard anything. I hope to hear from the app and have the charge taken off my account. | Heard from others this app can help you locate other services on the road. As soon as you create your account every interact on the app leads you up start up your subscription. I don't appreciate those pay tactics so can't do anything meaningful without paying. They increased the free trial from 3 to 7 days but if you don't cancel they'll auto renew for the year. Classy.... No thanks and can't recommend, deleted. | Nearly every button of the free version just tries to get you to buy the paid version. You literally can’t even get a feel for if the app would be useful without signing up for their 3-day free trial then paying $35 annually. It looks like it might be a good app but I’m not going to support marketing this aggressive, it’s ridiculous. | We’ve been using AllStays since 2012 (I think), and have used it exclusively, along with iOverlander (recently).  The staff at AllStays are very responsive and helpful.  Just signed up for AllStays Pro.  It’s even better. | Why don’t you ever tell you it’s $34.99 a year before they get your information out if you. Evil. | I am 68 and it may take me a few weeks to get accustomed to this app.  I really don’t know how long it will take because I have to pay money to get in to the app.  It wasn’t easy to find a phone number to call someone, but I finally found one and will call today for assistance. | Let me first say that I did love the app. however, I purchased it 2017 and I only had to pay for the app. I turned family members friends so many people onto a purchase app $10 and change. Because it was so worth it

Then they went to subscription basis and somewhere along the way I was told people who had the app before a certain day wouldn’t have to pay that subscription fee.

I have reached out by the only contact I could find email for Sam, but no response.  The common courtesy to respond to someone’s issue comment is just key. I hope you don’t have any issues with your stays because I doubt very seriously they’ll take care of them or respond to you. Other than that I do love the app and I’m sorry it’s a subscription based now for the old loyal’s  who made it what it is.  

I’m giving a one star because maybe you’ll respond! | I paid what was supposed to be a one time fee for the app. Now they have started charging annually and don’t respond to my queries. I am really annoyed by this. | Bought this app few years back after we purchased our first camper van. The most expensive app I ever bought at the time. Always thought the design was old and the interface was too busy....Haven't used it since until today when I got a notification that to take the full advantage I need to pay yearly subscription fee! 

There are so many free or low cost apps out there to choose from. | This a great app for long term planning and to discover new places | 2024- yes, still the best and most affordable trip planner and, combined with the old Streets & Trips that Microsoft abandoned, these two have been our planning guides for 14 years.
Wish it got a little more aggressive by combining its information with the actual travel planning process of miles, days, overnights, etc.  The ultimate for all of the planning apps would be to produce a calendar at the end, which is what I do with the combined information of these two, super programs. Good luck in your future upgrades to continue to be the best without becoming a slave to advertisers.

Okay, after 7 years of use, still the best-- by a long shot. If only it combined the old Streets & Trips route function and a calendar to help plan the trips, it would be phenomenal. AllStays is our all-the-time RV trip planning app. The BEST there is. Been using it for about 5 or 6years and it continues to be our main program. 6/2016 The on-line trip planners can't match the convenience because once you get off the Interstate out here in the west there is no Internet to refer back to use the on-line programs. Thank you for the automatic updates of new and revised camping spots. | Great tool for trip planning. | Was not told that there was a cost to use after 7 day free use | Unfortunately, no longer.  Almost a year ago I reported a bug - they had a link to search for reviews on the web that did not work.  The support person who replied to my email about it said they were working on as she wrote.  Many updates later it was still not working, and the basically gave the same response.  It is now “fixed” in the latest update.  What was the fix?  They deleted the feature!

The main thing I liked about the app was you could still search for campgrounds without an internet connection.  At the time I started using the app I did not have a smartphone, so often had no internet connection when not at a campground or place with public wifi.  Now that I can get internet connection virtually anywhere, the only real advantage to this app is now gone. | We’ve used pro-membership over five years for both planning and when traveling. AllStays now posts so many stores, gas stations and other businesses on their maps it’s become virtually impossible to find actual campgrounds. The filter pull-down to limit to viewing campgrounds only, does not disappear & blocks a large part of screen. It seems deliberate and given we pay for membership, seems disrespectful. Think it’s time to look at other options. | I have used this app for years and now there is a $35/year pay wall. That is outrageous for what the app provides. I will be using something else. | Love this app.  It’s the first place I check when travelling. | This is not free, except for the first week, which is very deceptive..  I am unable to delete my account without installing other software on my phone. Do not install. | Purchased pro subscription with a 20% discount offered through harvest host just to be offered a 50% discount on the app. 
Cannot sign in on app only through a website link which is not near as convenient and it appears you need to watch a number of videos to figure out how to use. 
My advice, stick to free app. | horrible way to lose what used to be loyal users. using alternate app now not this | We have tried other apps. Nothing compares to Allstays accuracy and user-friendly access to photos, reservations and information. Good job Allstays! | Says it’s free.  Makes you create a username and password.  Then tells you that you have to have a paid subscription. No thanks!!  Too many other free apps to choose from. | All this app does is save you from going to Walmart Cracker Barrel, or campground websites. All of these things show up on Google maps already. There aren’t any reviews more recent than 2021 for the areas we’ve been staying. Total scam and waste of money. | I’ve been using this app for a few years now and I still haven’t found a better RV app!  We use this one whenever traveling to get information on rest stops, overnight parking, gas stations, almost whatever we are looking for while on the road.  I haven’t really used it yet for find campgrounds or RV parks and ratings but just starting to use that functionality as well. | I travel months at a time in southwest. I really like the filter system and ability to send my choice to Maps. Works well without internet access. | I cant possibly trust this app!  After downloading it everything i touch gives me a popup forcing me to sign up and telling me its free for 7 days and $34.99 after that

But is that a monthly fee?  Annual?  One time and thats it?  How incredibly obtuse and deceitful do you want to start our relationship folks?  If you cant even be upfront with your charges 20 seconds after downloading it, im certainly not going to trust you with my payment info. Delete delete delete!  Run away from this one! | Five years back there were lots of issues - most have been resolved for my use - on the positive side the ability to search has improved greatly it’s not google level yet but who is… on the negative side the developer is again harping for the user to pay for a service that is free from google. 
Overall 
App is  user friendly, accurate, and helpful. 
A fee of $10 per year would be reasonable and in line with the services provided. | We find wonderful camping places that we would not have found without Allstays. Great info on places and easy to use. Thank you Allstays. | S | We’ve used Allstays since 2018 and have found it to be the best help in picking a place to camp and help us route safely through unknown places. | My sister recommended this app when we bought our truck camper over a year ago.  We use Allstays to find campsites, dump stations, gas, and rest areas.  They even show disbursed camp sites!  It’s so easy to use and provides quick connections to state and federal reservation websites.  Definitely worth the annual subscription fee! | If I could give this app a zero, I would. Pages are so convoluted and confusing. It’s impossible to use. No phone support. This could be the best app in the world, but impossible to get a straight answer. If they had phone support, questions could be answered in a matter of minutes. However, it takes hours if not a day for them to return an answer to an email. By then we’ve moved on. | I tried to unsubscribe. There is no place to unsubscribe. I don’t want this app. How do I get my money back? | We use this all the time for traveling and love it but, I would like an option added for 55+ campgrounds. It takes forever to find them otherwise. I also don’t like how the app automatically zooms in and out. I want to do it myself. I loose my place when I’m looking in a certain area. | They have updated this site and made it virtually impossible to still use the ‘free’ plan. Very disappointing and frustrating!! | Saw the app advertised in several platforms as a free app, but does not show anything without paying $40 to see it. Do yourself a favor and download iOverlander. | Definitely the best RV app out there. I have had it installed on all my phones since 2012 and it never disappoints. | Hard pass.  I understand things change over the years, but really?  It wasn’t a cheap app to start with and it’s the user provided data that gives the information we use.  Now to see it gated behind a subscription and to read that it only half works is really disappointing.

title: Headout: Travel Experiences
description:
A world of endless adventure awaits. A world that’s yours to explore. Your gateway to happiness? Headout.

Our mission? To unlock this happier world by connecting high-quality live experiences with people all over the globe. Whether you’re about to embark on a wild journey to a new city or are on the lookout for a thrilling escapade in a town you’ve been to many times before — we’ve got a curated collection of experiences that are just for you!
Think of us as your enthusiastic partner in fun. From champagne atop the Eiffel Tower to watching Formula 1 cars whiz by in Singapore, head out now and explore our world like never before.
- Join 20 million+ guests who’ve experienced the world with us
- Get access to over 10,000 experiences in 250+ cities
- Take your pick from exclusive offers & deals on last-minute tickets
- Change in plans? Don’t worry, our experiences offer flexible cancellation
- Book now, go whenever! With the ability to book tickets for later (yes, for real) – all you need to do is tap, tap, and go!

Hear it straight from our guests who’ve lived it:

“Purchasing the tickets to Dream World, on Headout was a fantastic decision. The booking process was smooth and straightforward, and I was able to easily select the date and time that suited me and my family best. At Dream World, not only did we breeze through the crowds, but it meant we we sure of getting entry into the theme park, especially with two children - both under the age of 8 years - eager to start exploring the park without any delay or drama! Buying the Dream World Visa gave us access to (almost) all the rides so with the wrist band on us, we went straight through without having the hassle of looking for change/currency at each ride. All in all, it was a stress-free and wonderful experience!”

“Book and pay a ticket and pay in the app with just a few clicks. Tickets do not have to be printed out and can simply be shown digitally in the app. It couldn’t be easier.
Everything went well on site. Versailles was breathtaking!”

“Through a different provider, I had a trip cancelled last minute the day before and was able to book on to this tour late in the evening the day before. Tickets and confirmation of collection point were clear and the tickets are very easily available on the app. We were picked up at the pick up location on time, and our guide met us and explained what the experience would entail and the time scales. I think our guides make was Raphael, he was very knowledgeable and gave us a very detailed explanation of Krakows history as we were driving through Krakow towards Auschwitz. Showing us all the landmark buildings and their history along the way. Very easy to understand and communicated very well, and very passionate about education us all on Polish history. Very happy with this service and would recommend using them to book tours through.”

We’d love to hear your thoughts, feedback, suggestions, and even your fun adventure stories! Feel free to drop us an email at support@headout.com or tweet us @headout. We’re all ears!

Got queries? We’re here round-the-clock for you! Our 24*7 support centers are just a chat away on www.headout.com.
releaseNotes:
1. Bye bye, clutter: We've split your bookings into neat tabs: Completed and Upcoming. Finding your next adventures is now a breeze.
2. Fulfilled bookings = happier journeys: We're rolling out a smoother booking experience for you. Filling in user fields has never been easier!
3. Not lost in translation: Dates will now speak your language, wherever you are. Currencies have met their match!
4. Bugs don't belong here, so we squashed them.
reviews:
I bought the tickets for something online and had to get this app to access my tickets. The instructions on where to redeem my tickets were wrong and I missed the window to my event. | I searched for “skip the line” tickets for Pompeii and came upon Headout. I booked and paid only to get an email telling me to expect lengthy waits to redeem my ticket voucher with no option to download the tickets themselves. The chat feature is just a bot that only responds to canned simple questions. There’s no customer service number to call. They do not reply to email. Stay far away from this useless “service”. | This app is just a google drive wrapper.  Should just be a web app. | Disastrous tour: rude guide and the attraction was closed. But will HeadOut refund us? Nope. They offered credits for future purchases. Get effed, HeadOut. | Horribly-designed app, confusing experience, doesn’t allow getting the ticket scan code without downloading the app (so you’re forced to download the app no matter what).  Bought tickets online beforehand, and still was forced to stand in the long line at the attraction to get ticket scan codes. 
Will delete this app as soon as we leave the country. | They intentionally mislead you about what tickets you’re buying and then refuse any refunds when you find out they deceived you. They’re a scalper but they make websites that make you believe they’re the official site of the attraction. Only use them if you like wasting money. | Scammers!!! Stole my money!!! Don’t buy tickets with them, they are mimicking NASA website and don’t return money back!!! | Terrible. I purchased a combo ticket for the prado museum and Royal palace on March 2024 after selecting my date and paying for the tickets the web headout send me a tickets for different dates, a month later. I contacted the web trying to get my tickets modified but they didn’t help at all. When I went to the museum and try to use the tickets the agents mentioned they often receive complaints from lots of tourist with the same issue. Headout didn’t change or modify the date or issue a refund. I had to call my credit card company for help since I had to buy new tickets | First they were not able to book the time they showed and only after we paid they came back and we had to change the time of the museum visit. Then the pdf they showed was only visible on their app and could not download so they can keep you in the app.  Lastly, after a few weeks I noticed my phone battery was strangely draining fast. This morning I looked at the % used and Headout was 59% even though I have not used it for weeks.  Clearly app has tracking me the whole time, either nefariously or they just have bad developers. Either way, deleting now and never using this service again. | They made a mistake booking my tickets that apparently are now nonrefundable and refuse to give me a refund. Never booking with them again. | This is a scam - they rip you off. | Open app, try to log in, it sends a link to your email.   Click link, that opens Safari which then opens App store which lets you re-open app, but you haven’t made any progress getting logged in.

Confirmation of ticket purchase arrives in email.  Aggregation of getting logged in repeats (even though only a minute or two has passed), as you try to get official ticket.  Finally reach a webpage (having given up on the app) that has a download link for PDF of ticket.   Hit “download” and the PDF is pulled down but not shown in Files (just in Safari recents).   When you realize that, you can show the ticket-taker, but you might have multiple PDFs to search through for the (in our case) 5 that are needed (look at the last bit of the looong file name to distinguish one from another and its duplicates). | Think twice before buying with them. They offer discounted combo packages but half of my tickets were denied entry and I had to buy new tickets at venue directly and was told there to email the company for the partial refund. The company replied quickly but the verdict was sorry the local company who sells the ticket is very strict with the refund and just denied it.. so I basically paid for the tickets twice…. | We booked tickets to Rome’s Castel Sant Angelo through what looked like an official website which never disclosed it was Headout. Then, we were never provided with the audio guide information we paid for and were treated poorly by the so called “host.”  The presentation of the website as official and the hiding of the fact that it’s a third party service seems sadly a bit common in Rome but that does not make it Ok. I won’t ever use Headout again for any services due to this misleading and ugly experience. On the plus side the visit to Castel Sant Angelo was great but it turns out we never needed anything from Headout to help us enjoy it!! | They are very bad at customer service and dont attend or give you a callback even after requesting a callback. Also the non refund policy is just simply the worst marketing strategy. I lost over 500$ because of a mistake and they dont even consider any unforeseen circumstannce as a valid reason even with genuine cases | beware when using this app, I purchased two orchestra tickets and when I got to the venue I found out they were switched for first mezzanine against my knowledge. They were not the tickets I selected when I was making my purchase and the even though I have two emails confirming I purchased orchestra seats,  they insist I purchased the seats I got with an obstructed view.  needless to say, my night was stressful and aggravating. I will never use them again. | All the tickets are x2 or x3 more expensive, and they don’t refund your money if you want to cancel you reservation. They stoled 72 euros from me and my family | I have been a avid follower and supporter of Headout and many of their outlets for several years. 

Getting the Headout Plus account has been one of the best decisions I’ve ever made! 

I have been nomadic traveling the country for the last 2+ years and thanks to Headout I have wandered and explored some destinations I never would do known existed!  

Would recommend to everyone! Friends, family, and even my enemies! 😃 

Keep up the great work and superb recommendations | I need a code number from a purchase to redeem a museum ticket & I had to download a whole app just to get it…. Deleting asap. I do not have the phone storage for this. I do not have the data to waste to download this stupid app in the street. | The available Dubai offers are Good. The payment worked seamlessly and e-tickets worked well.
But the Currency conversion charges that appeared in the Credit card statement was a surprise! The discount savings that I got from the offer was significantly reduced after these charges. While booking, It was not clear what was the base currency of the site. I could have easily paid in USD with the same card and saved on the AED conversion charges. 
The site should should mention their base currency on the payment page, so customers can choose which currency they want to pay. | This app deserves all the praise! It not only helps me plan my trips efficiently but also introduces me to unique experiences I wouldn't have discovered on my own. Highly recommended for all adventurers! | Been using this app for a while now, and it continues to impress me. The detailed insights, stunning visuals, and easy-to-use interface make it the perfect travel companion. | Can't imagine traveling without this app—it's like having a personal tour guide in my pocket. The detailed recommendations and offline maps are lifesavers! | My go-to travel companion now. Packed with info, beautiful visuals, and significantly enhances my travel experience. Two thumbs up! | This app is not in anyway associated to the official ticketing sits of the museums and attractions. It just inserts itself in the search results using deceptive domain names so you will but the tickets through them and pay more. I think this is deceptive and unecessary. Stay away! | Where to begin…

Headout contacted me less than 18 hours before my scheduled tour to notify me it has been canceled. 

They provided no options for rebooking as they canceled to late, and no other options were available! 

I reached out through email, and never got a response. I waited 45 minutes for live chat, and they told me they couldn’t help, and would need me to wait for an e-mail update. I’ve spent 3+ hours of my vacation trying to get this fixed, and I paid over $100 for my tickets.

I work in support, and I can tell you this has been the absolute WORST experience with a customer support team. This is gross negligence, and it has ruined the last day of my trip to rome. 

PLEASE STAY AWAY!! THEY WILL TAKE YOUR MONEY WITHOUT VERIFYING THE TOUR FIRST, THEN WILL CANCEL SO LATE YOU HAVE NO OTHER OPTIONS. 

If I could rate this company a negative 5-stars, I would. | Do not use this 3rd party app. I purchased a ticket and it was cheaper at the door. The ticket was to climb the dome and bell tower in Florence only for the rude people at the cathedral to say it’s not good for the dome even though the ticket says both. Customer service dropped me twice and did not resolve my issue. Do your best to book DIRECTLY with the institution. Also, fees ended up costing more than just buying in person. | They sold me tickets that don’t work. When I went to the Statue Of Liberty tour check in and scanned the QR code that was given to me, I was told the tickets were for October 27th which is incorrect. So headout basically sold me old tickets!!! So a warning to those who hate scammers, DO NOT BUY FROM THEM! I wish I could give this app 0 stars but I can’t, but they deserve it. | Dream World with Headout is a fantastic experience. Their Dream World Visa streamlines entry and ride access, making it ideal for families with young children. Highly recommended for a stress-free visit. | I've used Headout for last-minute bookings, and they've always come through, making travel planning a breeze. Their user-friendly app simplifies the ticketing process, and their guides are top-notch. | Bought tickets and we’re not informed anywhere during the process that we needed to download an app in order to access tickets. Was unable to download the app at the station, missed our train, and had to rebuy new tickets. Horrible communication from top to bottom. | Bought tickets to El Prado Museum using the website, I was never able to get the audio guide authorization after downloading the app. I followed the instructions up to the “You will get an email for authorization”, never got it, tried three times and even contacted their support which was helpless. Don’t buy tckts with their audio guides | I used this app to purchase a couple experiences while in Athens.  One set of our tickets showed in a few minutes with no worries.  However, another set of tickets purchased at the same time didn’t show up until very late.  After much waiting around we ended up buying tickets at the gate to keep our schedule.  I’ve been in contact with customer support who have informed us of a no refund policy and now I am screwed out of money.  Please save yourself the trouble that many here have experienced, including myself now, and take your business elsewhere | My apple pay gets declined for no reason. | Tickets to attraction did not include entrance. We had no notice of that and missed our tour. Fifty Euro lit on fire. Do not use this company. | I purchased and received confirmation for tickets to the Louvre. Several weeks later i received a message that said the tickets were not available and the time slots they offered were one week later — after our trip. I won’t trust or do business with them in the future. | It seems like this company wants to bury the bad reviews that span over multiple years by blowing up their reviews with fake 5 star reviews. They all read like a bot wrote them. What a joke. Had wanted to use the app, but never mind. Shady. | Reliable booking apps. Useful, have been using this apps for more than 2 years. | Really straight forward, rewarded for frequent booking. Great! | Easiest platform I can use. Excellent prices I love it | Great app. Love that we can book over the app with better prices. Thank you guys. | One-stop-shop for all your travel experiences, saving you time and effort in planning your itinerary. | Their discounted offers are a lie/scam based on a super inflated price. You basically are better off buying everything separately and schedule it to your convenience, rather than buying a bulk deal that is NOT A DEAL. Cancelation and refunds are not possible.

SAVE YOUR MONEY AND TIME!! | This app allows me to do flight, hotel and cab booking from my smartphone where I want and when I want to | It has been a wonderful experience with headout so far. Looking for more wonderful experience | I am trying to get a flight ticket then my friend refer about this app and when try to books I got a amazing experience with this app | Very easy to use and very convenient | Easy and convenient all for hotel booking. | I downloaded this app while visiting Singapore and tried to buy tickets. However after multiple attempts being told that the payment failed I reached out to customer service. They were unable to resolve this issue. Will never use again. | There are plenty of choices and booking was straightforward.

title: Framey
description:
Framey is a unique social travel app where you can easily plan, book, and share your travel holiday! Use it as a travel planner, or explore the best places to visit when travelling to different cities. Inspire others by sharing your travel experiences with the social platform!

PLAN | BOOK | TRAVEL | SHARE!

FEATURES:
Find local attractions
Create travel itineraries
Interactive travel map
Get directions to places near you
Travel social media feed
Share your holiday with others
Follow travel influencers’ travel blogs
Supports 8+ languages

EXPLORE:
Follow incredible travel influencers & trip planners from around the world to find new destinations to expand your travelling bucket list! Create your own collections of places to visit.

PLAN:
Use it as a travel planner to simply add places to visit or discover local sightseeing attractions.

TRAVEL GUIDE:
Use the map to discover places while you visit a city, on a road trip, or as a backpacker! The interactive map allows you to save, mark, & easily locate sights or secret escapes near you!

SHARE:
Use it as a social network, which acts as a travel blog with exciting travel channels to guide you when you visit a city or place. It will become your favourite travel planner in no time.

Use the trip planner to discover beautiful destinations & secret escapes! Add them to your bucket list or your itinerary when you travel to a city or a new destination. Take advantage of exciting travel content produced by travel influencers & trip advisors all around the world. Become a travel influencer yourself and start your travelling channel!

Travel & explore the world, take pictures, and share those moments with others easily with Framey. Plan your holidays by being inspired from other content creators & travel channels. On this travel app, we have gathered a lot of travel content creators to inspire you, so get your guide & transform dream photos into memorable trips!

Download Framey & get your travel guide to undiscovered destinations that our inspirational trip advisors & other travellers publish on their social feeds daily. Find exotic destinations & secret escapes chosen by our travel content creators, a.k.a your new travel friends. 

DISCOVER  BEAUTIFUL PLACES TO VISIT & EXPLORE THE WORLD

Join if you are a backpacker, roadtripper, or are planning your next holiday. Our mission is to guide & advise you about some of the most beautiful hidden places to visit on earth. Our trip advisors & content creators are avid travellers who share their passion for travelling & best experiences acting as local travel guides for your upcoming holiday plans.

A HOLIDAY PLANNER FOR ALL TYPES OF TRAVELLERS

Whether you plan to visit a city, road trip, solo travel/backpack across exotic destinations or are looking for secret luxury escapes you can easily create personalised travel feeds. Framey Travel app will help you make the best out of your trip! Use it as a guide to take on a new exploratory culture trip with features that will help you make better holiday plans. Framey is a dream come true for holiday planners & travel addicts. Get inspired everyday with Framey, by exploring your own city better with a map full of places to visit nearby for leisure & fun! 

SOCIAL NETWORK FOR TRAVELLERS

Get unique travel advice from Framey’s vast community of travel influencers and trip advisors! Follow your favourite creators & travel influencers to find amazing local & international spots when visiting a city, backpacking, or on road trips for your next holiday. Our travel community is continuously growing. We add new content every day, from all around the world. 

JOIN FRAMEY TRAVEL APP! INSPIRE OTHERS & USE IT AS A HOLIDAY PLANNER!
releaseNotes: Welcome to Framey! We've made some improvements so you can have a better experience with our app, helping you to find amazing spots and take beautiful pictures on your next trip.
reviews: All the pictures look fake like taken from apple or google maps. No point to this app. You can do the same or much more in Apple Maps. Deleted. | They want full access to any and all information on your iPhone. While I will share some so the app will work. Others are private, like all my Contacts.

title: TripHunter: Trip Planner
description:
Are you going to travel in Vietnam? TripHunter is the ideal travel application which contains thousands of destinations, restaurants, hotels, transportation and itineraries helps you to experience Vietnam in a smart, easy and economical way.

THINGS TO DO: This travel app introduces thousands of wonderful destinations from the North to the South of Vietnam, including: scenic travel spots, popular destinations, entertainment venues, cool beaches, amazing mountains, etc.
RESTAURANTS: TripHunter is a travel app which shares many delicious specialities, nearby restaurants, coffee shops, food street, etc. , specially the best & cheapest suggested by the locals.
HOTELS: TripHunter helps the travelers compare room rates, find great deals, then book the best hotels. This travel app offers not only hotels, but also hostels, guest houses, homestays, campsites.
TRANSPORTATION: TripHunter helps to find the best transport (bus, train, flight, boat, motorbike, etc.), instructs how to book or where to hire, etc.
AUTO GENERATE TRIP PLAN & BUDGET: Just enter you start date, return date and duration, this travel app will generate your own trip plan and make sure that you will not miss any famous travel spot.
REVIEW: You can share your feeling, experiences and photos when travelling. You can also refer to many reviews from the other travelers.
MAP: Detailed travel map is a very useful function you can find in this travel app.
ADD NEW PLACES: Add good restaurants, nice coffee shops, cheap hotels or beautiful travel spots, etc. This definitely helps the other travelers a lot.
SAVE FAVOURITE PLACES: Whenever you see a beautiful destination, a new travel spot, an unique restaurant or any great deal in the TripHunter travel app, just tap the Bookmark button!

TripHunter’s data is collected from many sources, especially the experiences of TripHunter team, locals and backpackers throughout Vietnam.
The TripHunter travel app is free and easy to use. The user interface is considered to the every detail, it is very clear so that you can search information easily and quickly.
TripHunter wishes to accompany you on all travel roads in Vietnam!

For any feedback, please send to support@triphunter.vn. Thanks for using TripHunter.
releaseNotes:
- Improve performance.
- Bug fixes.
reviews:
This app is comeplete trash. You literally cannot search anything other than a few places that the developer put on there. For example - if you’re planning to travel from Maryland to Florida, neither of those states will pop up in the search bar.
This app is a waste of time. If you happen to not read the reviews first, make sure to leave one after you delete this crap. | I want go to new destination,when i select then crash app. | This app is great. My wife and I use it all the time when we plan to explore somewhere in Vietnam. | Hơi chậm so với máy mình (ip5s). Cần update thêm nhiều địa danh và thông tin hữu ích nữa. Cám ơn designer tuyệt vời quá (y) | Good applications for travel | Một lần tình cờ dùng app Gowdee để khám phá du lịch tại các tỉnh phía bắc, tôi thật sự bất ngờ và thích thú bởi những chỉ dẫn hành trình du lịch trong ứng dụng. 1 ứng dụng không thể thiếu đối với tôi khi du lịch trong nước. | App rất hữu ích và tiện lợi | Tiện lợi và hữu ích cho những ai thích khám phá vẻ đẹp đất nước Việt nam!

title: Trip Designer
description:
Trip Designer is a trip planner and an expense tracker for travelers. Create your dream vacation and plan your amazing route in minutes.


Here's what you can do with Trip Designer:

- Places to visit for more than 120 cities around the world.

- Give us a budget or use our recommendation for a city, and our Trip Designer will help you to create a trip that fits to it.


- Easily locate popular places of a city on the map based on their prices and add them to your bookmark list. Don't forget to check concessions and free terms.


- Use our route planner to find the shortest route of your bookmarked places. After you visit a place, review it even if you are offline.


- Add and track expenses of your trip with chart and different currencies without needing an internet connection.


- Need to convert currencies? Our offline currency converter is there for you.


Try Trip Designer now!
releaseNotes: You can now view complete travel guides for more than 120 cities.

title: Denver Transit: RTD Bus TImes
description:
Live bus and train times, step-by-step navigation, stop announcements, service alerts and more - all in one app.

► Live directions – plan your trip with up to five ways to your destination
► Share your journey details with friends and family - they don't even need the app!
► Get Off Alerts – we'll let you know when it's time to transfer
► Live countdown boards for buses and trains
► See exactly where you bus or train is on the map right now
► Service Alerts - Find out about delays and diversions before you leave
► Save your favorite stops and stations
► Full seven-day schedules
► Schedule alarms and get reminders before your bus or train arrives.
► Quickly see the last train or bus arriving tonight
► Live and offline route maps
► One-tap ‘get me home’ journey planning
► Simple and clean - we only show you what you need to know

We love feedback! Get in touch with us at talk@travelwhiz.app or follow us on Twitter at @TalkToWhiz.

Please note that the app requires data access and works best with GPS / location on. Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life. Background GPS is only used when you have a Get Off Alert turned on.

Check out our Privacy Policy at https://travelwhiz.app/privacy and our Terms of Use at https://travelwhiz.app/terms
releaseNotes:
This release includes a number of bug fixes and improvements to the app, including:

A new status indicator when activating a Live Activity.
The app now correctly shows you multiple addresses when choosing a contact from your address book.
Train departure search now works correctly.
Watch App: Long line names now show correctly.

Your feedback means a lot - if you have any suggestions, or run into any issues, just tap on the Settings button and get in touch with us.

If you can spare a moment, we'd love it if you could leave a review on the App Store - it means so much to us to hear from you, our customer. Thanks for using the app!

It says track 1 but then I look at the sign at the station and both sides say track 2. title: Passporter | Plan and Travel
description:
Passporter, the app that will help you organize and plan your trip easily and quickly.

Our goal is to become your personal travel guide, a planner that will accompany you in all phases of your adventure. The Passporter app has been designed to inspire you with travel inspiration and recommendations from travelers like you. To organize your trip either alone or with your group of friends by inviting them to edit your itinerary. Book your flights, accommodations or activities directly from the app or upload them in PDF format. Highlight points of interest on the map of your route and organize it by days, stages or types of travel. And most importantly, you will be able to share all your travel recommendations with your friends and family :)  We travel with you wherever you go. 

*Before traveling:

Traveling is, without a doubt, one of the best possible experiences. However, getting informed and planning what you are going to do on your next trip can be a slow and boring process. That's why at Passporter we make it easy for you: we have selected the best content from our travelers so that with just one click you can access the top content. Maps, travel routes, unique places, selfie spots, typical monuments, the best restaurants... so that, no matter what you are looking for, you will find the perfect itinerary for you. And if you don't see anything that inspires you, you can always create new places with the recommendations of your friends who already know the destination. With this planner, trips seem to organize themselves!

*Put everything you need for your trip in order:

With Passporter you can save your reservations and important documents so you always have everything you need at hand - say goodbye to the stress of not finding your boarding pass in the inbox when it's your turn at the airport! In addition, you can create notes with recommendations from friends, blogs or social networks and have them always organized and accessible. Because nothing is more annoying than not remembering the name of that coffee shop that was recommended to you.

*Personalize your itinerary:

One of the strong points of this planner is that you can create categories to sort the places you want to visit as best suits you: by days, type of place, location on the maps... or however you want. In this way, you will create personalized and much more complete routes.

*Add reference points:

And so that you never miss any interesting place on your trips again, mark as a reference point the places you want to visit and you will always have them at hand highlighted among the others on the maps. 

*Organize your trip in a group:

Because we usually travel with more people, with this planner you can make travel easier for all your companions and yourself, inviting them to the itinerary so you can organize and plan together all the documents, places, routes, maps....

*Enjoy your planning while you are on the road:

Access your ongoing itinerary, review the day's plans and dedicate yourself to exploring and enjoying the vacation with your group of friends by carrying important documents and places to visit always at hand. With Passporter, forget about everything but enjoying the trips and the fantastic routes you've created or found, knowing that you have everything organized in the planner in your pocket.

*Share your anecdotes after the trip:

You will be able to recount your experience and share it with your friends or other travelers. To do this, create memories of the places you liked the most and come back to Passporter again and again to relive your adventures and retrace your routes through travel photos. Turn your notes into tips or travel diaries and become the envy of your friends and acquaintances!
releaseNotes:
New version with new features and improvements to plan your trips!

New features: 

- You will now be able to access the profile of your travel companions from the itinerary you have in common to follow them.
- We launched a new dashboard design to improve the navigation experience and the way all functionalities are displayed.
- Travel guides contain places with photos and information on the map and you can save them directly from the itinerary.
- You can organize your notes and upload your travel documents such as hotel reservations or flight tickets.
- You will be able to use the color selector when creating/editing your groups (activities, places, monuments etc) within an itinerary.
- Travel maps are now clickable and you can save places of a destination with ease. 


Improvements to your trip:
- Create trips faster.
- Add your travel dates to a calendar
- Plan your trip easier by saving places with a click.

New version for you to discover everything about your upcoming destination and use useful content by doing less ;)
reviews: Hay dos motivos que hacen que me guste usar esta app: la sección Discover invita a ver fotos de destinos que quizás aún no conocías y que te puede interesar conocerlos, y la parte de Itinerarios es bastante completa para muchos destinos, hay varios recorridos cargados en cada destino. | Al conocer la app no estaba motivado a descargarla y usarla, pero viendo las experiencias y recomendaciones de Jonan me animé a utilizarla y ahora es una de las apps que más uso. Tiene una cantidad de experiencias y material único y original. Es muy bueno para planificar futuros viajes. Yo personalmente la recomiendo wachitos 😉 | Cuando Jonan empezó a recomendarla no pensé que fuese a ser tan útil. No la uso tanto como me gustaría pero es genial para preparar futuros viajes, para organizar los que has hecho (mi galería es un desastre) y hasta para buscar inspiración aunque no sea para viajar. A mi preparar viajes o me da mucha ilusión o muuucha pereza, y ver fotos así me aumenta la ilusión (aunque no me reduce la pereza jajaja) | I would like to die it but ... you can only upload pics form your actual album on the phone. Most people store them on external  websites or Facebook. I have hundreds  of pictures on Facebook in album while it doesn’t let  you upload, yet the entire app requires connection to Facebook. I am sorry but no one wants to downloads pics again on the phone once it’s organized in the album. Makes this user friendly to external sites too. Would have more sense.

title: Hoptale: Remember Your Journey
description:
We take hundreds of trips in our lifetime but few of us can remember beyond the last couple of them. Hoptale helps you easily keep track of all your travels. Using our smart app, you can create a digital scrapbook from your photos, with map / itinerary / journal all integrated, in as little as 5 minutes. Turn your travel photos into visual journeys for everlasting memories or sharing with others!

By enabling more people to create and share their travel stories, we hope to bring a deeper appreciation for different people and places around the world. Together let's build a dynamic yet connected community of global travelers, one hop at a time!

WHAT WE OFFER:
- Smart Features
We developed many automated features to help you effortlessly capture your journeys.  So travel journaling becomes more fun and takes less time!
- Integrated Content
Photos, map, itinerary, journal ... we tie all the pieces of your journey into a complete travel story.
- Modern Design
We provide a fresh and elevated look to showcase & relive your trips better than traditional travel blogs.

USE HOPTALE IF:
- You need an easy tool to help you process the travel photos piling up and free up some storage on your iPhone.
- You are a travel fanatic that also likes to jot down memories & relive cherished moments
- You can’t remember the details of your last epic trip when your friends ask for recommendations
- Mom and dad want to keep up with your adventures around the world
- You want to modernize your travel scrapbook into a digital travel journal in your pocket
- You are interested in having your own blog but don’t know where to start or don't have much time
- Instagram is great for showing snippets of your trip but doesn’t capture the full journey
- Google Photos is great for photo storage but doesn't integrate travel itinerary, map, or journal
- The stories from your travels are some of the biggest tales of your lives. Why not keep a better record of them?


(preview music: www.bensound.com)
releaseNotes: Discover hundreds of destinations. Plan your next big adventure. Post your amazing journeys. Now all in one app. Join Hoptale, a community of travel lovers who create, share, and provide travel inspirations for each other.
reviews:
I was really liking the app, but half way through my trip, I couldn’t get logged in. I have been trying to get support for this, and have had no responses. Very disappointed that I will lose all of my info that I have input so far. | This is definitely a helpful app. But I must say, it crashes a lot. Which is annoying. | I use HopTail to log my travels in a coherent way and enjoy sharing them with others. I do wish that when I like someone’s trip, a tiny heart would appear on their trip in my gallery to remind me I’ve already seen it. | It’s easy to use and a lot of automatic features. However If you save most your photos in computer or google then it will be difficult because it can only upload photos from your phone. | Such a great way to plan itineraries without toggling between 15 different sets of applications. Love this! Used for our trip to portugal and will definitely use for other trips as well. | I love how easy it is to sort through my travel pictures. Features are easy to use and so so helpful! | I love hoptale! It’s so easy to share and learn from others travel suggestions! | I travel a lot and do a lot of research for my destinations to ensure I optimize my experience there, but when I look back at photos or people ask me awhile later for recommendations, it’s hard to remember.  Hoptale is the perfect travel diary for me to document my trips and memories, and also to share them with people.  It’s also great for browsing other travelers’ itineraries while trip planning!  With a slick UI it is easy to use and a must have for any explorer! | This app is very well made- it’s intuitive and easy to use. I’m so happy that I can create memories this way, as well as find other cool trips to go on in the future. | Since I love traveling and taking photos of the journey to record where I have been (from the stopovers to restaurants to BnB)
or what route I took either road trips or flights, this app is so convenient and super user friendly which I can save lots of time loading, arranging photos, in a jiffy.
Can’t be happier !!! | It’s pretty neat how easy it is to look at awesome travel itineraries. It helped me plan my trip to Olympic National Park and gave me some places I wouldn’t otherwise have known about. The pictures are beautiful which makes this much better than TripAdvisor! | Selecting the photos and jotting down some details are all you have to do. The time stamps and geo location synch really help to recreate the actual itinerary we experienced. Great way to remember and share trips and sites with others! | Love using this app to share photos from my trips and to share tips with my friends. Beautiful to look at and easy to use. Thumbs up. | Great user interface, easy to use, and best app I’ve seen to memorialize and tell a great story about travels and vacation experiences. | just to put it out there: i’m not a travel influencer. i don’t really even travel that much. i never searched for “travel journal app” on the app store. but after trying out the app at a friend’s recommendation, i realized that i never knew how much i needed this app.

i really just took it as fact that i had a bunch of unorganized travel photos on my camera roll that i’d have to scroll through the entirety of (especially after being buried in a gazillion more photos a few months after the fact) to find so i could show off my trip to others. i also found myself struggling to recount the activities that i did during the trip a year later, but i found myself being okay with just having the vague outlines of my experiences. i definitely wasn’t satisfied with this, but i was complacent.

but oh my gosh, this app really changes the way i remember my travels. like,, i can make a trip and then simply open the app and click on it later when i want to show someone how cool san francisco was? or recommend that ice cream stand in maine where i had the MOST DELICIOUS mint chocolate chip cone of my life during summer vacation, but whose name has slipped my mind? or i can just reread my journal entries from my trip to nyc to relive how amazed i was to be in the city of lights? these are all things i can do with hoptale, and i just find that so fricking cool!!

tl;dr: this app isn’t just for the travel influencers/bloggers out there; it’s really for anyone with a beating heart that even just travels once in a blue moon. | This is is so awesome.  I have been looking for a trip journal that does a bit more. Not only does it allow me to keep a detailed journal of my trip it shows me pictures, places and itinerary’s of people that have similar interests to me. Much better than trip advisor since It is very personalized and I don’t have to sort thru a bunch of useless posts. The best part of Hoptale is that it allows me to continually update my bucket list of places to visit and eat which gets longer every day:).  I can’t wait to detail my trip to Spain. | Really enjoy using this app. Slick interface, super easy and intuitive to publish albums. Going to use it to share my trips with friends! | App is very helpful for when you want to plan a trip to see what others have done. 
Looking forward to sharing many memories on Hoptale.

title: Flow: Trip & Travel Tracker
description:
Flow: Trip & Travel Tracker - Your Ultimate Travel Companion

Plan, Capture, Track - Unleash the Essence of Your Travels

Embark on unforgettable journeys with Flow: Trip & Travel Tracker - your ultimate travel companion. Seamlessly plan trips, capture photo memories, and track your adventures on an interactive scratch map. Whether you're a seasoned globetrotter or an enthusiastic explorer, Flow enhances every aspect of your travel experience.

- Plan Your Trips: Effortlessly organize travel itineraries with Flow's intuitive planner. Create detailed schedules, set reminders, and never miss a beat during your journeys.

- Capture Photo Memories: Relive adventures through photo memories. Create events for cherished moments, from scenic landscapes to local culture immersion.

- Track Your Adventures: Plot routes and drop pins on the interactive scratch map to visualize your journey. Mark visited destinations and watch the map come to life with your travel conquests.

- Express Your Mood: Share emotions and travel experiences with the mood feature. Capture the essence of your trips with personalized emoticons and reflections.

- Jot Down Daily & Private Notes: Keep a digital travel journal with daily notes. Document thoughts, reflections, and memorable encounters to cherish for years.

- Travel Pins: Mark significant places you've been and create a personal map of your travel milestones. Pinpoint favorite spots and revisit them anytime with ease.

- Embrace Gratitude: Cultivate gratitude during journeys with the gratitude feature. Reflect on the positive aspects of travel experiences and keep a thankful mindset.

- Stay Organized: Flow offers a user-friendly calendar for seamless planning. Keep track of upcoming trips, events, and activities, and stay organized on the go.

- Schedule Your Escapades: Create a comprehensive travel schedule with Flow's scheduler. Prioritize activities, allocate time, and optimize adventures for maximum enjoyment.

- Your Personal Travel Diary: Use Flow as your digital travel diary to preserve precious memories. Capture spontaneous moments and document the stories behind your travels.

Download now and embark on the journey of a lifetime. Whether a solo traveler or a jet-setting family, Flow enhances every travel experience with seamless planning, photo memories, mood tracking, and more. Mark visited destinations on the interactive scratch map, express emotions through personalized emoticons, and jot down daily reflections in your digital journal. Embrace gratitude during journeys with the gratitude feature and stay organized with Flow's user-friendly calendar and scheduler. Plan your trips, keep track of events, and create a comprehensive travel schedule for maximum enjoyment.

With Flow, capturing the essence of your travels has never been easier. Create events for every cherished moment, whether it's exploring scenic landscapes or immersing in local culture. Relive your adventures through photo memories, capturing every sight, taste, and emotion along the way. Use Flow as your digital travel diary, jotting down daily reflections and documenting the stories behind your journeys. Plot your routes on the interactive scratch map, dropping pins on visited destinations, and watch your map come to life with each travel conquest.

Stay organized and never miss a beat with Flow's intuitive planner. Create detailed schedules, set reminders, and optimize your trips for maximum enjoyment. Keep track of upcoming events, activities, and travel plans with Flow's user-friendly calendar. Prioritize your escapades and allocate time effectively using the scheduler feature. Whether planning a solo adventure or a family vacation, Flow caters to every type of traveler, making every journey a captivating tale.

Join the global community of adventurers and make every travel experience truly memorable with Flow: Trip & Travel Tracker. Download now and embark on the journey of a lifetime.
releaseNotes: - Bug fixes and improvements

title: Visit London - Official Guide
description:
Explore the best of London with the official Visit London guide and offline map, in partnership with Mastercard.
 
Browse hand-picked lists of the best things to do, and discover great things to do in London based on where you are and where you're going.
 
- Find out what's near you right now from the home screen, including great places to eat and top attractions.
 
- Find out what there is to do in an area before you go. Just tap "discover nearby" when looking at any point of interest to explore what's worth doing in that neighbourhood.
 
-Find hidden gems and explore London areas like a local; save places to view offline; and build your own personalised maps to make the most of your visit.
 
From top attractions, world-class museums, art galleries and amazing shopping experiences to buzzing markets, leafy parks, eclectic nightlife and some of the world’s most famous landmarks, London has it all and it’s all at your fingertips.
 
AT A GLANCE:
- Unique hand-picked lists of the best things to see and do in London brought to you by our expert team.
- Discover the best of London near your location or near where you're planning to go, including top restaurants, bars and attractions.
- All the key London sights and attractions, including Big Ben, Buckingham Palace, Tower Bridge, the Coca-Cola London Eye and many more, as well as plenty of hidden gems.
- Explore London like a local with insider guides.
- Easily navigate using our transport maps.
- Check how the Tube is operating with our travel status updates.
- Find out what’s on in London, including major events, theatre shows, exhibitions and much more.
- Save places to view offline to avoid data roaming charges.
- Receive offers and general information notifications based on your location.
- Plan ahead and create your own personal itinerary by saving all your favourites.
- Search for things to see and do, including all of London’s top landmarks. 
- Access and book great deals and offers, directly from the app. 
- Find the best routes and directions to navigate the city.
- Location responsive, quick and simple.
- Completely free with no hidden costs. 

ABOUT VISIT LONDON:
visitlondon.com is London’s official tourism website. Plan your perfect trip by searching the website for hotels, attractions, travel and events.
releaseNotes: Some improvements and bug fixes.
reviews:
