title: Guru Maps - Navigate Offline
description:
Detailed and easy-to-use offline maps. We have millions of points of interest (POI) on our maps. Record your GPS tracks and bookmark your favorite locations.

OFFLINE MAPS
• Amazingly-detailed maps covering the entire world.
• Based on open data from OpenStreetMap project.
• Download once, then use offline without restriction.
• Maps updated monthly with most-recent fixes and additions.

OFFLINE NAVIGATION
• Turn-by-turn driving directions.
• Voice instructions while navigating available in 9 languages.
• Routes for Driving/Cycling/Walking/Shortest Distance.
• Automatic rerouting gets you back along your way.
• Supports intermediate points on your itinerary.

GPS TRACKS
• Record your trips even when the app is in the background.
• Monitor your real-time speed, distance, and time traveled, as well as altitude right on the map during the trip.
• Choose from seven solid track colors, or altitude and speed gradients.

OFFLINE SEARCH
• Incredibly fast – results appear instantly as you type.
• Search in a variety of ways – by address, object name, category, or even by GPS coordinates.
• Searches simultaneously in multiple languages, making searching easier than ever.

BOOKMARKS
• Save favorite places on your map.
• Choose from a variety of map icons.

SYNCHRONIZATION [Pro]
• Sync your data across multiple devices.
• Data saved on a server as a backup.

IMPORT AND EXPORT
• It's easy to export your tracks, bookmarks, or your whole travel collection as a KML or GPX file.
• Organized into collections for easy access.
• Offline maps can be imported from sqlitedb/mbtiles format. [Pro]

ONLINE MAP SOURCES from thunderforest.com [Pro]:
OpenCycleMap, Outdoors, Transport, Transport Dark, Landscape, Mobile Atlas, Neighbourhood, etc.

SMALL FEATURES
• .GeoJSON file format is supported to display map overlays.
• One-finger zooming.
• Trip computer with speed and altitude.
• Tracking mode.
• Coordinates and scale.
• Customize what objects are visible.
• 11 different map languages to choose from.
• Adjustable label size.

PRO SUBSCRIPTION

Without subscription it's possible to create up to 15 bookmarks, record up to 15 tracks and have only 3 vector maps downloaded on your device.

Subscription allows you to create unlimited bookmarks and record unlimited GPS tracks, download unlimited maps, sync between devices, use Pro map sources and import offline raster maps in sqlitedb/mbtiles format.

Guru Maps Pro offers two payment options (prices may vary by location):
• monthly or yearly subscription (with 7-day trial version),
• one-time purchase for lifetime license.

For those who paid for any in-app purchase earlier, a lifetime subscription is activated automatically.

Should you choose to upgrade to a Pro subscription, payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period.

You may cancel automatic renewal and manage your subscription by selecting Manage App Subscriptions in your iTunes Account settings and selecting the subscription you want to modify. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when you purchase a Premium subscription, where applicable.

Terms of Service and Privacy Policy: https://gurumaps.app/terms_of_service

Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.
releaseNotes: This update adds the CarPlay Dashboard and rapid route building in CarPlay
reviews:
Years waiting for an app that was easy to use but powerful.
Simple, elegant screen and useful controls, you can configure the main screen a little bit,  great maps offline, layers and overlays depending on your current activity, and you can navigate main roads and trails…
Very close to be perfect….
Now I can throw away my garming and have all on my phone | Worldwide downable maps, offline functionality and quick tech support. Easy and intuitive to use. The too-fast-talking issue was an iOS problem resolved by going to Settings->Accessibility->Spoken Content and adjusting the Speaking Rate slider. So impressed that I gladly paid for the pro license. | I’ve been using Guru maps for a couple years now. I got the lifetime pro license to use on both my iPad and my Android phone. I love the app on both platforms. 
  I really like how you can download entire maps databases for different states in the US and also different countries around the world. I travel internationally for work quite a bit and this is very helpful in being able to download a map database and have detailed maps available in full functionality when offline. Yes, Google maps allows you to download some areas but you don’t get any functionality with it like directions for any type of navigation and it just doesn’t get the details of the downloaded area like this does. 

Bottom line- worth every penny for the pro license and I absolutely love the app. If you appreciate a good maps app, and all sorts of functions with it, this one’s for you! | While I have not used this app much, there is one big deal breaker when I used it for navigation. It is as if voice navigation directions are speeded up 5x! Unless that is fixed, IMO, it is bot usable as is. | Excellent map app. Especially like the downloaded maps. Have used it to fly along roads in the mountains in a Cessna where cellular is spotty. Fast response on tech service questions. | I’m on a cruise ship and wanted to track our route, so this is working pretty well. 

I wonder if you buy it for iPhone do you have to buy it again for iPad? | I installed the app and to try it out I tried to navigate to a location near my house. It seems to work but the voice that reads out the turn by turn instructions plays at extremely high speed (I would guess 10x normal) so it is impossible to understand it. This is with iOS v16.1.1, on an iPhone 12 mini. | The ability to access maps and GPS navigation is great here in New Mexico, where cell service is nil away from urban areas. | It’s no way to figure out how to use navigation or driving directions, just wasted my time. | Great app. The functionality without internet or cell service was exceptional on a recent visit to Baja California. Looking forward to using it on my next adventure here in the states now. | Guru maps has replaced my stand alone GPS unit for hiking and hunting. This is a well written and very useful app. Thanks. | This app is awesome especially with the fact that u can use it offline once the map is downloaded for ur country. Pls keep improving it cos it helps with getting coordinates airborne especially for operations. | The app does not register as accurately and quickly the direction I’m moving or the direction I’m aiming the phone. This is an issue when trying to smoothly navigate in the city. The app also has issues with recognising street addresses or names of locations. As a paid use of Guru, I still end up having to use Google maps. | With the ability to download offline maps and the recent addition of topographic data, this is the best map app for my uses. | Just learning how to use Guru Maps. Enormous potential! Applying it to aerial survey of protected areas in Africa. Looking forward to mastering it in aid of Biodiversity Conservation. | I’ve been using Guru maps for many years in multiple countries including Mongolia, Costa Rica, Indonesia, Australia and the USA. 

The maps are accurate, the downloaded versions are quick and snappy in areas where WiFi and cellular are hard to come by. 

The developer is awesome! We get new features all the time, customer service is great, and updates for each OS come quickly after apple releases any updates. 

This is a map app for pros. | Used the app for backpacking for several days. Super easy to download offline maps and it provides excellent offline navigation both for driving and walking. It even provides excellent terrain information for walking directions, showing the expected elevation changes which was super helpful. | I use it frequently on my daily walks and trade images of my route with my daughter in CA. We also enjoy sharing flowers and nature photos we see along our route. 
It uses NO Cellular Data and doesn’t track us | Please add an option to display the mountain peaks in feet. Currently they are only in meters. | I have used Guru maps for year. (Before they renamed it).
I love the route tracking. We travel a lot and it is great documentation for where and when we have been. I also use it on bike trips that we take from time to time. So I have markers and route tracking from all over.  
I use it on bike t | If your looking for an offline map, this is it! | The best app I have found for hiking directions in the SF Bay Area. The app is awesome. | This is my go-to app for anything that Google or Apple Maps can’t handle. With selectable map sources, downloadable vector maps, decent navigation, and rock solid track recording, it does everything I need. It even works offline with a little preparation. | I used this a few years ago when it was Galileo. I downloaded maps for 5 US states. The UI is confusing but you get used to it, so everyone I showed this to I would explain the UI so that they’d understand what it does. The map design is not as nice as other mapping apps but this app works offline, so I used it occasionally when I was out of signal range.

Since then, Galileo/Guru has changed their pricing from one time to subscription, and other apps have added offline use. HERE Maps has unlimited downloads, a simpler UI, and better map design; Google Maps has limited downloads but a nicer UI and more data on the maps.

I stopped using Galileo/Guru when I had to restore my phone from backup. It lost the maps it had already downloaded and wouldn’t let me download them again without payment. I understand why they raised their prices but it made me think about why I didn’t use it much (map design, ui, features), and led me to delete it. I don’t want to be reminded every month that I’m paying for something I only use occasionally; I only subscribe to things I use often.

It’s the right app for some people so *it’s worth a try* but it wasn’t worth the higher price for me so I’ve removed it and no longer show it to my colleagues. | Used guru in the states, Israel and Peru so far. Best way to travel. Easy and accurate. | Love this app.  Would get 6 stars if it had support for Apple CarPlay. | The free version only allows you to trace 15 trails. Also, I haven’t figured out how to map individual waypoints. | I received the developer’s response: 

“We develop app. Map data in our app belongs to OpenStreetMap project. It’s open map project and anyone could edit it. No Russia is involved in mapping. It’s more like a consequences of their foreign affairs."

Dear Evgen B. - thank you for your response. Maybe you should look into alternative OpenMap projects? Had internet existed during WW2 half of Europe would still be showing up as Germany or the III Reich. Today’s leadership of russia is just as aggressive as the leadership of yesterday’s nazi Germany. To say your map depiction is “a consequence of their (russia’s) foreign affairs” is equivalent to you rewarding their internationally condemned acts of aggression. The current führer of russia will be gone one day and you shouldn’t be rewarding his unlawful actions. 
Thank you. 
____
Like the app in general but I dislike the fact it rearranges some of the world borders based on the views of the kremlin tyrant. Several ‘countries’ (abkhasia??, transnistria?? LOL) it depicts do not exist but are rather territories occupied by the russian autocracy. The same applies to Crimea which, according to 99.99% of the world’s population, rightfully belongs to Ukraine. | My family and I were trying to find a house in a remote area and our GPS on our phones couldn’t reach service where we were. Not to mention we wouldn’t be able to find our way back home. Luckily, a year ago, I decided to download this Guru map offline app and to my surprise, it worked offline like It said it would. So this is diffidently an app worth keeping. As well as a real map. Lol | Lots a better and free options.  Not sure how they expect to survive with the new subscription model | Love that it is free and shows terrain for all my trad climbing routes in Yosemite Valley. I can record the gps trail map, save pins for not so well marked climber trails. Have been using this app for over 5 yrs! | One thing that I have found that I dislike about the app is the search function. Let’s say I open the app and conduct a search. It finds my results, and if I select a result, a new panel appears on the right side of the screen that shows the update map. I cannot seem to merge the search results into the main screen. I do not want a small sliver of screen. If I search for a location, chances are I want the map to be centered on my selected search result. Full screen, big map. No small windows or split screens. Horrible aggravating implementation of search. | Wonderfully useful as visitors from the USA | Para no perderte con o sin conexión, para que nuestro destino esté al alcance de nuestra mano. | The best navigation app I have ever used. I really love it | Galileo is very polished and packed with features. I have used this to get around my own town online as well as other countries without cell service with great success.

The map quality for Open Street Maps is not as good as Google or Apple maps in my city, but the great part is i can fix errors in minutes instead of “reporting a problem” with the map and waiting months for it to be fixed. | Too buggy, especially if try your so called offline mode. And remember, putlerlover, that Crimea is not Russia, it is Ukraine. | Some might call me obsessed with maps especially when traveling!  Galileo is a great tool for planning trips as well as recording tracks of where you've been in great detail. I have constantly found new ways of utilizing this app. | اتمنى ان يدعم اللغة العربية بأسرع وقت | Like the import KML feature | I love this app. I've used it for motorcycle navigation and hiking. It couldn't be easier to import a route and the map download sizes are much smaller than other apps. And now you can view Google maps in the app with a data connection. Buy this now. | The Best!!!!!!
Lo mejor es que es offline y me a servido de mucho. | One of the best offline apps I have found. Have been using it for several years without problems. Nothing short of great. | You pay 4$ and you are done - you have all the maps of the world, including trail maps, in front of you. No need to use data. Simply download the map of the state or country you are going to before your trip and you are done! 
Several benefits:
1. You can store your points of interest on the map forever. Your friend recommended you a nice restaurant? You have discovered new location you want to remember?  Everything is easy to store for use in future. 
2. You can store all your routes' treks and see what was your speed and altitude profile. Very useful for keeping track of your trips.
3. You could easily import maps of your friends or your maps from google maps in gpx format. 
Conclusiong: I have been recommending to all my friends who travel and they love it! Simply the best! | Check the map for mistakes. Crimea is Ukraine not russia | This is such a great tool to have!  Being able to locate trails wherever you find yourself is a significant benefit.  Very much worth the price! | I've had this app for several years now and it always amazes me. I just loaded 26000 campground waypoints for the US. All one needs is files in gpx format. I have many different waypoint file loaded. The small vector maps for states/countries are awesome and quite detailed. | Better than google maps. | The best offline app for navigation and tracking! I tried other apps, this one is my favorite. | Works well so far. Still learning the app.

title: Roam Around - Plan Trips AI
description:
Introducing the ultimate travel app that will change the way you plan your trips forever! Our app uses the latest technology to create personalized travel plans that are tailored to your preferences and interests. With our app, you'll never have to spend hours researching and planning your next vacation again. 

Our app uses the latest AI technology that can understand natural language and provide human-like responses. You can simply tell the app which city you want to visit, how many days you will be there, and how many hours you want to spend sightseeing each day. The app will then generate a personalized travel plan that includes all the must-see attractions in the city, as well as hidden gems that only locals know about. 

Our app also includes daily itineraries that are carefully curated to make the most out of your time in the city. Each itinerary includes a summary of the day's activities, including the time and location of each attraction, as well as suggestions for restaurants and cafes to visit. You can easily follow the itinerary, or customize it to fit your own preferences. 

But what if you don't like a particular attraction that's included in the itinerary? No problem! Our app includes the option to remove places from your itinerary, and regenerate a new plan
releaseNotes: - Unlimited AI powered travel plans option
reviews:

The real Roam Around is found at RoamAround.io

Tried to watch an ad for an additional token - that didn’t work.  Figure it out Roam Around. | These guys are clearly stealing the IP of roamaround.io and pretending to be them. This is not the real Roam Around. I wouldn’t trust this app, also has lots of ads and tries to get you to pay. I would NOT trust this app on your phone. | Money and it doesn’t work. Big joke | The real Roam Around can be found on RoamAround.io, this app is fraudulently using our trademark. We've requested it be removed several times. | It is filled with ads on every page and sections not helpful at all. The itinerary recommends to airport everyday the plan doesn’t make sense

title: Daily Tracker Journal & Diary
description:
• Apple “New Year, New You” Favorite 
• Apple App Store Staff Favorite

Lumen Trails Daily Tracker lets you take notes, make lists and keep track of other things in your life such as time, workouts, expenses, calories, food, weight, sleep or anything else you can think of, even where you've parked your car! Thousands of people use it every day, and they love it because it truly makes a difference in their lives. 

“I've been using Daily Tracker for 6 months and continue to love it. One of my most sticky and useful apps ever on my phone.” – David D'Souza

The beauty of Daily Tracker is that you can track absolutely anything. There are tons of other apps that allow you to track one or two things, for example, calories and weight. But what if you decide to track something else? Say, how many cigarettes you smoke as you try to quit, your eating habits, or even net worth? Daily Tracker is the app for that!

Instead of having one app for your to-do lists, one for tracking expenses, another one for tracking your weight, you can declutter your home screen and just have one app that does it all. You'll have all your important data stored in one convenient place, for many years to come.

Designed exclusively for the iPhone and iPad, Daily Tracker is incredibly powerful, easy to use, and looks beautiful on the Retina Display. It can even backup your data automatically to Google Drive, sync with iCloud, and is fully accessible with Apple VoiceOver in 12 languages. There's nothing that comes even close to it. And to top it all, your data is not locked on your iPhone. You can export it to Excel or Google Drive.

So what's truly important to you right now? Your Health? Fitness? Finances? Productivity? 

Track it and get things done!

Have a Question? We are here to help! Email us at support@lumenspark.com, or find us on Twitter @lumentrails.
releaseNotes: Fixes and improvements based on your feedback.
reviews:
I've tried other apps, but I keep coming back to this one.  The terminology of "categories" is a bit confusing, but once you accept how it works, you can do a lot of things with it.  Some things will be more useful to you than others, but that is its flexibility.  I keep track of my medications. I keep health notes in the daily journal.  I keep track of what I eat in the food diary.  It is simple because you can just take a picture of your meal.  I keep track of my various exercising. I love the resulting graphs to track progress. | This seems like a nice app. But I’m picky. Particularly when it comes to paywalls.
It is my opinion that in part of the advertising for an app, it should tell you that after your seven day trial you will have to pay. If you don’t put it in the pictures on the App Store, at least have a passing comment about it in the description.

Yes, this app is a great idea. Yes, I would like to use it.
Yes, I would rather have 5 different apps on my phone than use this one app for ⭐️$49.99/year⭐️.
It would be fantastic if I could use this app in a limited fashion, and if I wanted full access then I pay for “pro”. But that’s not the current situation.
I understand money isn’t a problem for some people. I understand I’m probably being a bit stingy. But my policy for apps is that I don’t pay for them when it’s recurring payments.
Y’all do what you will, I wish you the best. | The app includes a lot of templates but it’s missing a spreadsheet like template.
Can you add a spreadsheet like template? | The app is very good however I am looking for another app that the font can be increased or decreased. Because of the this issue, I would not recommend this application. | I keep track of bills, my budget, medication, daily actions, diary, etc. I keep track of everything and it has lists and alarms, anything you could want to do and list things anyway you want them listed. I have completely organized many things but still have more things to set up. It is so flexible and awesome.

Many years later, I have tried other apps but this is by far the one I have always been able to track things, make lists, log my time throughout the day. | This is my first review ever, that’s how much I love it. I downloaded 5 different apps until I found this one. I own my own business and this app has been invaluable. 
There are only 2 things I’d like to see added/ changed w/ the To Do List. 
*Leave the completed items with the date. Rather than them being under “Earlier” use the actual date. 
*can the recurring items be separated for each date. I have tasks that I do each day/week/month and take notes on each. But those same notes show up when the task comes up again. | I’ve loved this app for years. But recently I’ve noticed that some time the sentences I wrote disappeared afterward (not saved or sync). Can you fix the bug so it won’t happen again? | Downloaded this app that is listed as free with in app purchases.  It will not let me get past the opening screen that requires either an immediate purchase OR restoration of prior purchase.

Zero free about using this app. I will not try your trial because this is bad faith listing the product as free in Apple App Store to start with.

Do not download, do not use and do not give this company your business given their misleading marketing practices. | Scammed me 50$ do not purchase. | Is there a way to log items using Apple Shortcuts? I want to log a value on the day I click the shortcut. | Downloaded but took me to the updated version. Please refund both app charged. | These developers are legit!
I started this app 12 years ago, on my iPhone 4S! It cleared so much clutter out of my head and kept every kind of list known to man.
Then went through major life changes, had zero room on phone and stopped using productivity apps.
I noticed this offloaded on my phone and just assumed it probably didn’t exist anymore because everything is a subscription these days.
But I opened it, it was fresh, completely updated, no ads, not bothering me for money and ALL my lists from a decade ago are still there!
It seems to cover what I now use several apps to do!
It has a hierarchical filing system.
Hello you!
I remember you ♥️ | I’ve been using this app for a few months to track my Total Gym workouts, my weight, fasting record, and a whole bunch of home and work projects. Maybe there could be some better options for creating custom data entry forms, but this is the best one-size-fits-all app that I have found. It seamlessly and automatically syncs between my iPhone and iPad. You are probably going to find that this app has more capabilities than first meets the eye. The applications for this app are limitless! I’ve got to say I love it and highly recommend it. | please add the ability view multiple years of data at a time!! this will allow users to see more progress at once, and make the graph data easier to read.  Currently when I track my weight, if 180 is the lowest in a year it's the shortest bar, then if I start the next year at 178 then 175, the 178 bar is at the top of the chart, visually higher than 180 from the previous year. (or allow users to set max/min values for a graph so the bar height is consistent if clicking through year to year)

with weight loss apps this is standard and MUCH more useful for looking at lots of data over time. Recently i haven’t been using Lumen Trails much or recommending it to friends because of this. 

 And if there was a more robust way to compare different graphs that'd be awesome! so I could easily see the relationship between my eating/exercise/weight/etc. 

thanks! | Very handy to keep important numbers.  I use this app many times a week. | I’m used for many year and never have problem very security | Exquisite DIY tracking platform. Been using it for 8 years without a hitch! Thank you! | I’m starting my third year using this app and it’s the best one out there. Numerous ways to work your schedule with it. I’d give it 5 stars except for a couple of quirks - some things that should take 1 step take 3, there is no way to un-delete if you make a mistake, and there’s no way to keep my docs in the order I want them | This app has truly been a lifesaver,  by tracking my medication and the effects that I began to notice helped my doctor to see what was happening and I was taken off of the medication before it caused too much more harm to my health. I will always be Thankful for this app, I can track everything that is important to me Thank You for a Great App it’s more than just a tracker I have had this app since my first iPhone. | Seriously-Best ever!  I love keeping score with myself. Track all my virtues and mistakes here! Straight up 10. | My go to app for daily organization. | I can no longer edit entries in the ap.  Why?  I used to be able to add onto an entry and this capability has been removed.  Please bring it back. | I love this app but the latest updates have made the look messy and unfriendly. I don't want to see every day of the week, if there is nothing in that day. Plus, you can’t sort ascending order in sort by date anymore. It puts the soonest dates at the bottom. BRING BACK GROUP BY DATE please. 

 I can only hope enough people complain and another update is rolled out. Thanks. | And it’s always being improved. Powerful, versatile and easy to operate. | Loved it from the very start.  It’s still my most versatile app on my phone. Keeps track of all my thoughts, plans, lists and projects! | These apps used to be great, now they're overpriced and false advertising. 

That's too bad. | This app allows me to keep a bunch of different lists in an easy to organize way. Plus I love how the hidden and locked notes themselves are hidden. Unless someone is familiar with the app, they wouldn’t even know that more now there. | I have enjoyed using this app for years. It does what it is designed to do, whether for notes, daily diary, food log or whatever. It is reliable which is the most important thing. | I’ve had this app on my iDevices for over a decade. It’s like a Swiss Army knife, one flexible and easily configured app that does lots of useful stuff. | Multi-function and always there. Really appreciate the security. | I use this for journaling and keeping track of everything!    I would be lost without it.    It is so functional and can be used for so many things. | I’ve never written an app review before but felt compelled to thank the creators for this app. I can track anything I want and get daily monthly and yearly totals to see progress. I haven’t found any other app that compares. This has helped me so much with sticking to habits, getting things done and motivation overall. Thank you, thank you, thank you. I hope this app lasts as long as I do, it’s a game changer for me! Definitely worth the $40 a year. | I just downloaded this, so I can’t give a full review yet. But one thing I can speak to is the false accusation that users are being bilked out of 40 bucks without any free use of the app.  True, you are asked to approve a charge order for a yearly subscription, costing $39.99, posted to your iTunes account.  But, there is a clear statement that you have 30 days before the charge is actually debited to your account, with a specific day given when that will happen. Canceling the subscription any time BEFORE that day will prevent the debit.  I have implemented cancellations of this sort numerous times without incident, most notably for monthly subscriptions to streaming services like Disney+ or Acorn.  An opt-out arrangement is perfectly reasonable and a common business practice, although it does require you to set a reminder for the end of the trial period if you want the option of cancellation.  I can recommend an app to do that, by some outfit in Seattle WA (can’t remember their name …). | I’ve been using this app for a few years on and off, and paying for it back then has been more than worth it now many times over. I love that it is not gimmicky and it’s so widely and easily applicable to so many different kinds of tasks. It doesn’t take long to learn it, and once you do, it is simple but powerful. 
I admit, from time to time I search for some other new daily tracker app to get something new, different, and exciting. Sometimes I’ll try one, sometimes I’ll even pay a few bucks for one that looks good. Maybe I use it for a little while. But every time I keep coming back to this one. It’s just better than any other tracker. I mean, I guess if you have some specific thing that you want to track in a particular way, or you want fancier graphics or motivations, maybe there is a better app that’s built just for you and that thing, but otherwise just go with Lumen. | I got a screen where I could subscribe. That’s it. It says there’s a free trial, but I haven’t even seen anything. I immediately deleted it. Oh well. | I used to used this app and then they made a new subscription model and locked me out of my own data. VERY unscrupulous company. Would recommend not touching this app with a ten foot pole. Sorry I have to give it 1 star | Deceptive advertising | I can see why Lumen Tracker is so popular with the people who use it.  It is a simple tool with an easy-to-grasp organizational structure, yet features that enable powerful capabilities for tracking and analyzing information.  The app is immediately useful without learning anything about the features, though. | Great app for everything. I keep track of my jobs time and material. I use it for camping checklists 
You can use it for almost everything. | In app purchase is only if you want to use the app. [eye-roll emoji]
Listing implies everything but one feature (something about trails) is free, but in reality you have to sign up for annual $40 fee to use it at all. Sorry, that’s deceptive, expensive, and you wasted my time. | I first got these apps about 5 years ago. I really like the flexibility of the tool. I ended up just using one for everything because it was easier to manage. Then they released this all in one, and I was excited. So glad I kept my old apps!!! You can’t even try the new one without starting a 30 day trial that ends in a yearly charge of $40!  It’s not even close to that good. Not. Even. Close. I can’t see any value in subscribing at all. I would pay $12 for each significant new release. That’s it. | Needs Larger Bold Font.Everything else is great. | As a user of their old app, the developers decided to redirect all their old apps to this app but not before forcing you to pay for access to your old notes even though it was free before.

All my notes are locked behind a paywall after updating the old app! Literally turned the app to ransomware. AVOID! Shall complain to Apple. | This is the most useful app you can buy!
I have been using this app since it was first available. At the beginning it was a free app, like most were, but it is now a subscription. Which is ok, after all business need to make a profit.

This is still the most useful app you can buy!  I have none better than this one. You can track anything you can think of.

GREAT APP!

George | Guys I love this app, I’ve used it for years to track sooo many things, organize to do lists, it’s amazing! And I love MOST of the most recent update. But please give us back the option to keep a bubble “clear” — color coding is an important way I organize within the app and I don’t want color in every single thing — also, it would be amazing if we had even a few options about text within notes — like bold/italic/underline — thanks! | I’ve appreciated this app for a very long time, and I gather I’m not alone in that. The developers have been careful to remain faithful to the unique design, and they have tweaked the app periodically to incorporate improvements made possible by new versions of iOS. Many thanks to the developers. | Bring back the time/date slider. The current change means I have to enter the time blind — I can’t see the time dialogue, just the keypad. Very bad design! | I resent that the app is not straight forward. I downloaded it and then it pops up demanding payment to continue. Be honest and list the price, don’t waste my time downloading, pretending it’s free. | This app has grand ability to assist in clarifying what is actually happening in someone’s life. By simplifying the process of recording events big or small, at the user’s discretion, it gets employed more often by this user than anything similar in the universe of apps. Would love to see a Mac app that would allow for the entry of data and syncing across Mac, iPhone and iPad.October 20, 2020 after many years of using to my benefit daily tracker I would love to see the additional capacity to be able to send documents to the daily journal from other applications kind of likeEvernote allows me to forwardEmail messages to my notebook. We also desperately need to re-support multi photo add. | This app is my major journaling tool. I’ve used this for seems like 10 years. Love being able to insert pictures into daily notes. I keep a list of appointments that I need to review at the end of the year in this app. These same appointments disappear out of my iPhone calendar after a few months. I hate that.

title: Badger Maps: #1 Route Planner
description:
Badger Maps is an all-in-one field sales app that helps outside sales professionals increase revenue and save time by automating busywork. 

Founded in 2012, Badger solves a longstanding field sales problem: juggling a map, a calendar, a schedule, and client data — all while dealing with traffic and spending hours behind the wheel, struggling to arrive to appointments on time. 

Badger is designed with all the needs of field salespeople in mind. It takes care of all of their challenges with multiple features: route optimization (with 100+ stops), lead generation, interactive client data visualization (import your spreadsheet or sync Badger with your CRM), meeting notes logging, field activity reports, and more! 

With Badger, a field sales rep has 10 more meetings a week, saves 3 hours behind the wheel, and cuts time spent on frustrating admin work by half. 

Additionally, field sales managers can get insights on their reps’ performance in the field, manage territories more easily, boost CRM adoption, plan their reps’ accounts and routes, and tackle any problems in the team before they even arise.  

Here’s the monthly ROI you can get with Badger:

• 22% more sales
• 20% fewer miles 
• 32 hours less planning and scheduling
• And 40 extra meetings 

One of our customers, NCR Aloha, a POS software provider, grew sales by 20% monthly and reduced drive and planning time by 25% daily and 50% weekly, respectively. 

Cutter & Buck, a sportswear company, obtained 8 extra meetings weekly per rep and grew annual revenue by 22%. 

Here’s what our customers are saying: 

“Our efficiency has easily increased over 100% since we’ve implemented Badger Maps. Each rep is seeing at least 2 more accounts and finding 2 more prospecting opportunities per day.”

— Ken Buck, Regional Sales Manager, Danaher

“With Badger, I averaged 25% more in sales in the last year. I also cut my driving by a huge amount, no more zig-zagging all over town.”

— Lara Thomas, Sales Rep, DermaTran

“Badger contributed heavily to our bottom line. Reps consistently met our goal of 10 meetings a day, 50 per week. That wouldn’t have been possible without Badger.”

— Rich Becker, Grad Solutions, Arizona Director of Business Development

Below is an overview of the features we offer (feel free to visit our website for more details). 

Our features will contribute to your bottom line by cutting drive and planning time — giving you more time to sell. 

But Badger goes beyond just saving you time in driving and planning. 

It also equips you with on-the-go lead generation, mobile territory management, customer visualization on a map, and more!

• Route Planning & Optimization

Quickly select the accounts you’d like to meet and create the fastest route with one swipe. Add up to 120 stops to your route and optimize it in seconds. Save your routes for future use and plan a week’s worth of routes in seconds. 

• Find New Leads on the Go

Fill schedule gaps after a canceled appointment with new leads that you can find based on keywords like industry, product type, and business name. Add them to your optimized route and get there in minutes.

• Visualize and Segment Customer Data on a Map

Visualize and segment your prospects and customers using attributes such as priority, sales YTD, and days since the last meeting. Your territory colorized and filtered by customizable characteristics will enable you to see your best opportunities at your fingertips. 

• Customer Relationship Management 

Manage customer relationships easily by setting up follow-up reminders and logging meeting notes — including photos — to get an A+ on customer satisfaction. You can also send data to your CRM directly from Badger and receive weekly sales reports to quickly understand what’s working and what’s not. 

See why field salespeople love Badger. Increase visits and boost sales productivity. Try out Badger for free now!

Terms of Use: https://www.badgermapping.com/terms-of-use/.
releaseNotes: · Bug fixes and improvements

I now have the paid single user license (month to month and very reasonably priced) as that’s all I need for now. They also have team and enterprise packages as well if you have more users. 

They also respond quickly on all support platforms, including email (same day, and many times, same hour!). 

If you need to do any route sales, service or other account check-ins on a regular basis, or manage a team that does, give the Badger team a try. Definitely assists me in be most efficient in travel time to different customers. After using this app I feel that it has a tremendous impact on my already tights schedule. title: Exoticca: Travelers’ App
description:
Extraordinary travel made simple! Download the Exoticca App, a companion for Exoticca travelers.

Your journey starts the moment you book a trip with Exoticca:
• See the status of your trip from booking to completion
• Be prepared with regular updates on essential trip documents and handy useful information in the countdown to your departure date
• Access all your travel documents instantly, from itineraries to flight details and much more
• You’re in control: check all elements of your trip, such as passport details, flight schedules, travel requirements and hotel accommodation at any time 
 
Stay in the know, on the go:
• The Exoticca App keeps track of your daily activities whilst you’re away, so you’ll always know what’s next on your itinerary
• No Wi-Fi? No worries! The Exoticca App works offline, so you can stay up to date without costly roaming charges or Wi-Fi
• From meeting points to transfer times and internal flights
• A helping hand is just a few taps away with our 24/7 trip assistance, available through the app by telephone or WhatsApp

About Exoticca:
Exoticca is an online travel agency dedicated to putting the world within your reach! Our team of expert travel crafters create affordable handmade package vacations to more than 50 destinations around the world. Each of our itineraries is designed to ensure you have an unforgettable experience, wherever you travel!

Follow us around the world:
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/exoticca/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ExoticcaUS
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Exoticca
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/exoticcaES

Need help?
Contact us: https://www.exoticca.com/us/contact
releaseNotes: Minor bugfixes
reviews:
Was an amazing trip of a lifetime. Was nervous about being a solo traveler but shouldn’t have. Fellow travelers were welcoming. A little snafu by Exoticca on arrival but it was sorted in a few hours and the rest of the trip was exciting, informative about the history and a ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ experience! | From picking up in the airport all way home fantastic experience our guide Mohamed very knowledgeable friendly polite and funny very helpful in our needs
Same for the drivers will recommend excoticca travel did a great job | I had to cancel our trip to S America due to cancer treatments and they canceled the wrong trip they canceled a trip I had booked to Greece in September. They would not change my reservation plus they would not refund my deposits on either trip. 
If almost impossible to reach a real person on the phone you have to wait for days for someone to email you back regarding issues. 
I will never use this company again. I love to travel and usually book 2-3 overseas trips per year and have never had issues with other companies 
Customer be aware! | I love exoticca with very reasonable price with good package.. I will use exoticca again definitely.. our tour guide hahmad was wonderful with lots lot’s knowledge of history.. thank you again 👏 | Over all trip was very well organized all hotels were nice except Ramsey Hilton Hotel was good but rooms were outdated I mean really out dated faucet handles falling a part they had moved us second day to newly renovated room because our room had lizard and new room was very nice but my friend had same old room but the hotel was very nice location was perfect other hotels were amazing and their affiliates planet travel was amazing service was outstanding overall I would go with exoticaa again | Overall it was a great experience, but there is definitely room for improvement.  I wish we could have visited more hotels especially in Santorini especially being a popular tourist destination. The Apollo hotel definitely needs to be removed from the itinerary , water needs to be provided to the travel agents and more spare time to do things as we know our clients better than anyone else. Also, the time to do this Fam needs to be changed from April to May right before the high season. | I booked the 9 day tour to Egypt March 2024 and it was fantastic.  I especially loved the 3 day Nile River Cruise. Our tour director was Michael Saad and I have to say he was spectacular!!!  You must ask for him when booking an Egypt tour.
